original: asty uttarasyāṃ diśi devatātmā himālayo nāma nagādhirājaḥ /
analyzed: asti uttarasyām diśi devatā ātmā himālayaḥ nāma naga adhirājaḥ

original: pūrvāparau toyanidhī vigāhya sthitaḥ pṛthivyā iva mānadaṇḍaḥ // Ks_1.1 //
analyzed: pūrva aparau toyanidhī vigāhya sthitaḥ pṛthivyāḥ iva māna daṇḍaḥ

original: yaṃ sarvaśailāḥ parikalpya vatsaṃ merau sthite dogdhari dohadakṣe /
analyzed: yam sarva śailāḥ parikalpya vatsam merau sthite dogdhari doha dakṣe

original: bhāsvanti ratnāni mahauṣadhīś ca pṛthūpadiṣṭāṃ duduhur dharitrīm // Ks_1.2 //
analyzed: bhāsvanti ratnāni mahā auṣadhīḥ ca pṛthu upadiṣṭām duduhuḥ dharitrīm

original: anantaratnaprabhavasya yasya himaṃ na saubhāgyavilopi jātam /
analyzed: ananta ratna prabhavasya yasya himam na saubhāgya vilopi jātam

original: eko hi doṣo guṇasaṃnipāte nimajjatīndoḥ kiraṇeṣv ivāṅkaḥ // Ks_1.3 //
analyzed: ekaḥ hi doṣaḥ guṇa saṃnipāte nimajjati indoḥ kiraṇeṣu iva aṅkaḥ

original: yaś cāpsarovibhramamaṇḍanānāṃ saṃpādayitrīṃ śikharair bibharti /
analyzed: yaḥ ca apsaraḥ vibhrama maṇḍanānām saṃpādayitrīm śikharaiḥ bibharti

original: balāhakacchedavibhaktarāgām akālasaṃdhyām iva dhātumattām // Ks_1.4 //
analyzed: balāhaka cheda vibhakta rāgām akāla saṃdhyām iva dhātumat tām

original: āmekhalaṃ saṃcaratāṃ ghanānāṃ cchāyām adhaḥsānugatāṃ niṣevya /
analyzed: āmekhalam saṃcaratām ghanānām chāyām adhas sa anugatām niṣevya

original: udvejitā vṛṣṭibhir āśrayante śṛṅgāṇi yasyātapavanti siddhāḥ // Ks_1.5 //
analyzed: udvejitāḥ vṛṣṭibhiḥ āśrayante śṛṅgāṇi yasya ātapavanti siddhāḥ

original: padaṃ tuṣārasrutidhautaraktaṃ yasminn adṛṣṭvāpi hatadvipānām /
analyzed: padam tuṣāra sruti dhauta raktam yasmin a dṛṣṭvā api hata dvipānām

original: vidanti mārgaṃ nakharandhramuktair muktāphalaiḥ kesariṇāṃ kirātāḥ // Ks_1.6 //
analyzed: vidanti mārgam nakha randhra muktaiḥ muktāphalaiḥ kesariṇām kirātāḥ

original: nyastākṣarā dhāturasena yatra bhūrjatvacaḥ kuñjarabinduśoṇāḥ /
analyzed: nyasta akṣarāḥ dhātu rasena yatra bhūrja tvacaḥ kuñjara bindu śoṇāḥ

original: vrajanti vidyādharasundarīṇām anaṅgalekhakriyayopayogam // Ks_1.7 //
analyzed: vrajanti vidyādhara sundarīṇām anaṅga lekha kriyayā upayogam

original: yaḥ pūrayan kīcakarandhrabhāgān darīmukhotthena samīraṇena /
analyzed: yaḥ pūrayan kīcaka randhra bhāgān darīmukha utthena samīraṇena

original: udgāsyatām icchati kiṃnarāṇāṃ tānapradāyitvam ivopagantum // Ks_1.8 //
analyzed: udgāsyatām icchati kiṃnarāṇām tāna pradāyi tvam iva upagantum

original: kapolakaṇḍūḥ karibhir vinetuṃ vighaṭṭitānāṃ saraladrumāṇām /
analyzed: kapola kaṇḍūḥ karibhiḥ vinetum vighaṭṭitānām sarala drumāṇām

original: yatra srutakṣīratayā prasūtaḥ sānūni gandhaḥ surabhīkaroti // Ks_1.9 //
analyzed: yatra sruta kṣīra tayā prasūtaḥ sānūni gandhaḥ surabhīkaroti

original: vanecarāṇāṃ vanitāsakhānāṃ darīgṛhotsaṅganiṣaktabhāsaḥ /
analyzed: vanecarāṇām vanitā sakhānām darī gṛha utsaṅga niṣakta bhāsaḥ

original: bhavanti yatrauṣadhayo rajanyām atailapūrāḥ suratapradīpāḥ // Ks_1.10 //
analyzed: bhavanti yatra oṣadhayaḥ rajanyām a taila pūrāḥ surata pradīpāḥ

original: udvejayaty aṅgulipārṣṇibhāgān mārge śilībhūtahime 'pi yatra /
analyzed: udvejayati aṅguli pārṣṇi bhāgān mārge śilībhūta hime yatra

original: na durvahaśroṇipayodharārtā bhindanti mandāṃ gatim aśvamukhyaḥ // Ks_1.11 //
analyzed: na durvaha śroṇi payodhara ārtāḥ bhindanti mandām gatim aśvamukhyaḥ

original: divākarād rakṣati yo guhāsu līnaṃ divā bhītam ivāndhakāram /
analyzed: divākarāt rakṣati yaḥ guhāsu līnam divā bhītam iva andhakāram

original: kṣudre 'pi nūnaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapanne mamatvam uccaiḥśirasāṃ satīva // Ks_1.12 //
analyzed: kṣudre pi nūnam śaraṇam prapanne mamatvam uccais śirasām satī iva

original: lāṅgūlavikṣepavisarpiśobhair itas tataś candramarīcigauraiḥ /
analyzed: lāṅgūla vikṣepa visarpi śobhaiḥ itas tatas candra marīci gauraiḥ

original: yasyārthayuktaṃ girirājaśabdaṃ kurvanti vālavyajanaiś camaryaḥ // Ks_1.13 //
analyzed: yasya artha yuktam girirāja śabdam kurvanti vāla vyajanaiḥ camaryaḥ

original: yatrāṃśukākṣepavilajjitānāṃ yadṛcchayā kiṃpuruṣāṅganānām /
analyzed: yatra aṃśuka ākṣepa vilajjitānām yadṛcchayā kiṃpuruṣa aṅganānām

original: darīgṛhadvāravilambibimbās tiraskariṇyo jaladā bhavanti // Ks_1.14 //
analyzed: darī gṛha dvāra vilambi bimbāḥ tiraskariṇyaḥ jaladāḥ bhavanti

original: bhāgīrathīnirjharasīkarāṇāṃ voḍhā muhuḥ kampitadevadāruḥ /
analyzed: bhāgīrathī nirjhara sīkarāṇām voḍhā muhur kampita devadāruḥ

original: yad vāyur anviṣṭamṛgaiḥ kirātair āsevyate bhinnaśikhaṇḍibarhaḥ // Ks_1.15 //
analyzed: yat vāyuḥ anviṣṭa mṛgaiḥ kirātaiḥ āsevyate bhinna śikhaṇḍi barhaḥ

original: saptarṣihastāvacitāvaśeṣāṇy adho vivasvān parivartamānaḥ /
analyzed: saptarṣi hasta avacita avaśeṣāṇi adhas vivasvān parivartamānaḥ

original: padmāni yasyāgrasaroruhāṇi prabodhayaty ūrdhvamukhair mayūkhaiḥ // Ks_1.16 //
analyzed: padmāni yasya agra saroruhāṇi prabodhayati ūrdhva mukhaiḥ mayūkhaiḥ

original: yajñāṅgayonitvam avekṣya yasya sāraṃ dharitrīdharaṇakṣamaṃ ca /
analyzed: yajñāṅga yoni tvam avekṣya yasya sāram dharitrī dharaṇa kṣamam ca

original: prajāpatiḥ kalpitayajñabhāgaṃ śailādhipatyaṃ svayam anvatiṣṭhat // Ks_1.17 //
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ kalpita yajña bhāgam śaila ādhipatyam svayam anvatiṣṭhat

original: sa mānasīṃ merusakhaḥ pitṝṇāṃ kanyāṃ kulasya sthitaye sthitijñaḥ /
analyzed: sa mānasīm meru sakhaḥ pitṝṇām kanyām kulasya sthitaye sthiti jñaḥ

original: menāṃ munīnām api mānanīyām ātmānurūpāṃ vidhinopayeme // Ks_1.18 //
analyzed: menām munīnām api mānanīyām ātma anurūpām vidhinā upayeme

original: kālakrameṇātha tayoḥ pravṛtte svarūpayogye surataprasaṅge /
analyzed: kāla krameṇa atha tayoḥ pravṛtte sva rūpa yogye surata prasaṅge

original: manoramaṃ yauvanam udvahantyā garbho 'bhavad bhūdhararājapatnyāḥ // Ks_1.19 //
analyzed: manoramam yauvanam udvahantyāḥ garbhaḥ bhavat bhūdhara rāja patnyāḥ

original: asūta sā nāgavadhūpabhogyaṃ mainākam ambhonidhibaddhasakhyam /
analyzed: asūta sā nāga vadhū upabhogyam mainākam ambhonidhi baddha sakhyam

original: kruddhe 'pi pakṣacchidi vṛtraśatrāv avedanājñaṃ kuliśakṣatānām // Ks_1.20 //
analyzed: kruddhe pi pakṣacchidi vṛtraśatrau avedan ājñam kuliśa kṣatānām

original: athāvamānena pituḥ prayuktā dakṣasya kanyā bhavapūrvapatnī /
analyzed: atha avamānena pituḥ prayuktā dakṣasya kanyā bhava pūrva patnī

original: satī satī yogavisṛṣṭadehā tāṃ janmane śailavadhūṃ prapede // Ks_1.21 //
analyzed: satī satī yoga visṛṣṭa dehā tām janmane śaila vadhūm prapede

original: sā bhūdharāṇām adhipena tasyāṃ samādhimatyām udapādi bhavyā /
analyzed: sā bhūdharāṇām adhipena tasyām samādhimatyām udapādi bhavyā

original: samyakprayogād aparikṣatāyāṃ nītāv ivotsāhaguṇena saṃpat // Ks_1.22 //
analyzed: samyak prayogāt a parikṣatāyām nītau iva utsāha guṇena saṃpad

original: prasannadik pāṃsuviviktavātaṃ śaṅkhasvanānantarapuṣpavṛṣṭi /
analyzed: prasanna diś pāṃsu vivikta vātam śaṅkha svana anantara puṣpa vṛṣṭi

original: śarīriṇāṃ sthāvarajaṅgamānāṃ sukhāya tajjanmadinaṃ babhūva // Ks_1.23 //
analyzed: śarīriṇām sthāvara jaṅgamānām sukhāya tat janma dinam babhūva

original: tayā duhitrā sutarāṃ savitrī sphuratprabhāmaṇḍalayā cakāse /
analyzed: tayā duhitrā sutarām savitrī sphurat prabhā maṇḍalayā

original: vidūrabhūmir navameghaśabdād udbhinnayā ratnaśalākayeva // Ks_1.24 //
analyzed: vidūra bhūmiḥ nava megha śabdāt udbhinnayā ratna śalākayā iva

original: dine dine sā parivardhamānā labdhodayā cāndramasīva lekhā /
analyzed: dine dine sā parivardhamānā labdha udayā cāndramasī iva lekhā

original: pupoṣa lāvaṇyamayān viśeṣāñ jyotsnāntarāṇīva kalāntarāṇi // Ks_1.25 //
analyzed: pupoṣa lāvaṇya mayān viśeṣām jyotsnā antarāṇi iva kalā antarāṇi

original: tāṃ pārvatīty ābhijanena nāmnā bandhupriyāṃ bandhujano juhāva /
analyzed: tām pārvatī iti ābhijanena nāmnā bandhu priyām bandhu janaḥ juhāva

original: u meti mātrā tapaso niṣiddhā paścād umākhyāṃ sumukhī jagāma // Ks_1.26 //
analyzed: u mā iti mātrā tapasaḥ niṣiddhā paścāt umā ākhyām su mukhī jagāma

original: mahībhṛtaḥ putravato 'pi dṛṣṭis tasminn apatye na jagāma tṛptim /
analyzed: mahībhṛtaḥ putravataḥ u pi dṛṣṭiḥ tasmin apatye na jagāma tṛptim

original: anantapuṣpasya madhor hi cūte dvirephamālā saviśeṣasaṅgā // Ks_1.27 //
analyzed: ananta puṣpasya madhoḥ hi cūte dvirepha mālā sa viśeṣa saṅgā

original: prabhāmahatyā śikhayeva dīpas trimārgayeva tridivasya mārgaḥ /
analyzed: prabhā mahatyā śikhayā iva dīpaḥ tri mārgayā iva tridivasya mārgaḥ

original: saṃskāravatyeva girā manīṣī tayā sa pūtaś ca vibhūṣitaś ca // Ks_1.28 //
analyzed: saṃskāravatyā iva girā manīṣī tayā sa pūtaḥ ca vibhūṣitaḥ ca

original: mandākinīsaikatavedikābhiḥ sā kandukaiḥ kṛtrimaputrakaiś ca /
analyzed: mandākinī saikata vedikābhiḥ sā kandukaiḥ kṛtrima putrakaiḥ ca

original: reme muhur madhyagatā sakhīnāṃ krīḍārasaṃ nirviśatīva bālye // Ks_1.29 //
analyzed: reme muhur madhya gatā sakhīnām krīḍā rasam nirviśati iva bālye

original: tāṃ haṃsamālāḥ śaradīva gaṅgāṃ mahauṣadhiṃ naktam ivātmabhāsaḥ /
analyzed: tām haṃsa mālāḥ śaradi iva gaṅgām mahauṣadhim naktam iva ātma bhāsaḥ

original: sthiropadeśām upadeśakāle prapedire prāktanajanmavidyāḥ // Ks_1.30 //
analyzed: sthira upadeśām upadeśa kāle prapedire prāktana janma vidyāḥ

original: asaṃbhṛtaṃ maṇḍanam aṅgayaṣṭer anāsavākhyaṃ karaṇaṃ madasya /
analyzed: asaṃbhṛtam maṇḍanam aṅga yaṣṭeḥ anāsava ākhyam karaṇam madasya

original: kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktam astraṃ bālyāt paraṃ sātha vayaḥ prapede // Ks_1.31 //
analyzed: kāmasya puṣpa vyatiriktam astram bālyāt param sā atha vayaḥ prapede

original: unmīlitaṃ tūlikayeva citraṃ sūryāṃśubhir bhinnam ivāravindam /
analyzed: unmīlitam tūlikayā iva citram sūrya aṃśubhiḥ bhinnam iva aravindam

original: babhūva tasyāś caturasraśobhi vapur vibhaktaṃ navayauvanena // Ks_1.32 //
analyzed: babhūva tasyāḥ catur asra śobhi vapuḥ vibhaktam nava yauvanena

original: abhyunnatāṅguṣṭhanakhaprabhābhir nikṣepaṇād rāgam ivodgirantau /
analyzed: abhyunnata aṅguṣṭha nakha prabhābhiḥ nikṣepaṇāt rāgam iva udgirantau

original: ājahratus taccaraṇau pṛthivyāṃ sthalāravindaśriyam avyavasthām // Ks_1.33 //
analyzed: ājahratuḥ tad caraṇau pṛthivyām sthala aravinda śriyam a vyavasthām

original: sā rājahaṃsair iva saṃnatāṅgī gateṣu līlāñcitavikrameṣu /
analyzed: sā rājahaṃsaiḥ iva saṃnata aṅgī gateṣu līlā āñcita vikrameṣu

original: vyanīyata pratyupadeśalubdhair āditsubhir nūpurasiñjitāni // Ks_1.34 //
analyzed: vyanīyata pratyupadeśa lubdhaiḥ āditsubhiḥ nūpura siñjitāni

original: vṛttānupūrve ca na cātidīrghe jaṅghe śubhe sṛṣṭavatas tadīye /
analyzed: vṛtta anupūrve ca na ca ati dīrghe jaṅghe śubhe sṛṣṭavataḥ tadīye

original: śeṣāṅganirmāṇavidhau vidhātur lāvaṇya utpādya ivāsa yatnaḥ // Ks_1.35 //
analyzed: śeṣa aṅga nirmāṇa vidhau vidhātuḥ lāvaṇye utpādye iva āsa yatnaḥ

original: nāgendrahastās tvaci karkaśatvād ekāntaśaityāt kadalīviśeṣāḥ /
analyzed: nāga indra hastāḥ tvaci karkaśa tvāt ekānta śaityāt kadalī viśeṣāḥ

original: labdhvāpi loke pariṇāhi rūpaṃ jātās tadūrvor upamānabāhyāḥ // Ks_1.36 //
analyzed: labdhvā api loke pariṇāhi rūpam jātāḥ tad ūrvoḥ upamāna bāhyāḥ

original: etāvatā nanv anumeyaśobhaṃ kāñcīguṇasthānam aninditāyāḥ /
analyzed: etāvatā nanu anumeya śobham kāñcī guṇa sthānam aninditāyāḥ

original: āropitaṃ yad giriśena paścād ananyanārīkamanīyam aṅkam // Ks_1.37 //
analyzed: āropitam yat giriśena paścāt an anya nārī kamanīyam aṅkam

original: tasyāḥ praviṣṭā natanābhirandhraṃ rarāja tanvī navalomarājiḥ /
analyzed: tasyāḥ praviṣṭā nata nābhi randhram rarāja tanvī nava lomarājiḥ

original: nīvīm atikramya sitetarasya tanmekhalāmadhyamaṇer ivārciḥ // Ks_1.38 //
analyzed: nīvīm atikramya sitetarasya tad mekhalā madhya maṇeḥ iva arciḥ

original: madhyena sā vedivilagnamadhyā valitrayaṃ cāru babhāra bālā /
analyzed: madhyena sā vedi vilagna madhyā vali trayam cāru babhāra bālā

original: ārohaṇārthaṃ navayauvanena kāmasya sopānam iva prayuktam // Ks_1.39 //
analyzed: ārohaṇa artham nava yauvanena kāmasya sopānam iva prayuktam

original: anyonyam utpīḍayad utpalākṣyāḥ stanadvayaṃ pāṇḍu tathā pravṛddham /
analyzed: anyonyam utpīḍayat utpala akṣyāḥ stana dvayam pāṇḍu tathā pravṛddham

original: madhye yathā śyāmamukhasya tasya mṛṇālasūtrāntaram apy alabhyam // Ks_1.40 //
analyzed: madhye yathā śyāma mukhasya tasya mṛṇāla sūtra antaram api alabhyam

original: śirīṣapuṣpādhikasaukumāryau bāhū tadīyāv iti me vitarkaḥ /
analyzed: śirīṣa puṣpa adhika saukumāryau bāhū tadīyau iti me vitarkaḥ

original: parājitenāpi kṛtau harasya yau kaṇṭhapāśau makaradhvajena // Ks_1.41 //
analyzed: parājitena api kṛtau harasya yau kaṇṭha pāśau makaradhvajena

original: kaṇṭhasya tasyāḥ stanabandhurasya muktākalāpasya ca nistalasya /
analyzed: kaṇṭhasya tasyāḥ stana bandhurasya muktā kalāpasya ca nistalasya

original: anyonyaśobhājananād babhūva sādhāraṇo bhūṣaṇabhūṣyabhāvaḥ // Ks_1.42 //
analyzed: anyonya śobhā jananāt babhūva sādhāraṇaḥ bhūṣaṇa bhūṣya bhāvaḥ

original: candraṃ gatā padmaguṇān na bhuṅkte padmāśritā cāndramasīm abhikhyām /
analyzed: candram gatā padma guṇān na bhuṅkte padma āśritā cāndramasīm abhikhyām

original: umāmukhaṃ tu pratipadya lolā dvisaṃśrayāṃ prītim avāpa lakṣmīḥ // Ks_1.43 //
analyzed: umā mukham tu pratipadya lolā dvi saṃśrayām prītim avāpa lakṣmīḥ

original: puṣpaṃ pravālopahitaṃ yadi syān muktāphalaṃ vā sphuṭavidrumastham /
analyzed: puṣpam pravāla upahitam yadi syāt muktāphalam vā sphuṭa vidruma stham

original: tato 'nukuryād viśadasya tasyās tāmrauṣṭhaparyastarucaḥ smitasya // Ks_1.44 //
analyzed: tatas nukuryāt viśadasya tasyāḥ tāmra oṣṭha paryasta rucaḥ smitasya

original: svareṇa tasyām amṛtasruteva prajalpitāyām abhijātavāci /
analyzed: svareṇa tasyām amṛta srutā iva prajalpitāyām abhijāta vāci

original: apy anyapuṣṭā pratikūlaśabdā śrotur vitantrīr iva tāḍyamānā // Ks_1.45 //
analyzed: api anyapuṣṭā pratikūla śabdā śrotuḥ vitantrīḥ iva tāḍyamānā

original: pravātanīlotpalanirviśeṣam adhīraviprekṣitam āyatākṣyā /
analyzed: pravāta nīlotpala nirviśeṣam adhīra viprekṣitam āyata akṣyā

original: tayā gṛhītaṃ nu mṛgāṅganābhyas tato gṛhītaṃ nu mṛgāṅganābhiḥ // Ks_1.46 //
analyzed: tayā gṛhītam nu mṛga aṅganābhyaḥ tatas gṛhītam nu mṛga aṅganābhiḥ

original: tasyāḥ śalākāñjananirmiteva kāntir bhruvor ānatalekhayor yā /
analyzed: tasyāḥ śalākā añjana nirmitā iva kāntiḥ bhruvoḥ ānata lekhayoḥ yā

original: tāṃ vīkṣya līlācaturām anaṅgaḥ svacāpasaundaryamadaṃ mumoca // Ks_1.47 //
analyzed: tām vīkṣya līlā caturām anaṅgaḥ sva cāpa saundarya madam mumoca

original: lajjā tiraścāṃ yadi cetasi syād asaṃśayaṃ parvatarājaputryāḥ /
analyzed: lajjā tiraścām yadi cetasi syāt asaṃśayam parvatarāja putryāḥ

original: taṃ keśapāśaṃ prasamīkṣya kuryur vālapriyatvaṃ śithilaṃ camaryaḥ // Ks_1.48 //
analyzed: tam keśapāśam prasamīkṣya kuryuḥ vāla priya tvam śithilam camaryaḥ

original: prayatnasaṃstambhitavikriyāṇāṃ kathaṃ cid īśā manasāṃ babhūvuḥ // Ks_3.34 //
analyzed: prayatna saṃstambhita vikriyāṇām katham cit īśāḥ manasām babhūvuḥ

original: taṃ deśam āropitapuṣpacāpe ratidvitīye madane prapanne /
analyzed: tam deśam āropita puṣpa cāpe rati dvitīye madane prapanne

original: kāṣṭhāgatasneharasānuviddhaṃ dvandvāni bhāvaṃ kriyayā vivavruḥ // Ks_3.35 //
analyzed: kāṣṭhā gata sneha rasa anuviddham dvandvāni bhāvam kriyayā vivavruḥ

original: madhu dvirephaḥ kusumaikapātre papau priyāṃ svām anuvartamānaḥ /
analyzed: madhu dvirephaḥ kusuma eka pātre papau priyām svām anuvartamānaḥ

original: śṛṅgeṇa ca sparśanimīlitākṣīṃ mṛgīm akaṇḍūyata kṛṣṇasāraḥ // Ks_3.36 //
analyzed: śṛṅgeṇa ca sparśa nimīlita akṣīm mṛgīm akaṇḍūyata kṛṣṇasāraḥ

original: dadau rasāt paṅkajareṇugandhi gajāya gaṇḍūṣajalaṃ kareṇuḥ /
analyzed: dadau rasāt paṅkaja reṇu gandhi gajāya gaṇḍūṣa jalam kareṇuḥ

original: ardhopabhuktena bisena jāyāṃ saṃbhāvayām āsa rathāṅganāmā // Ks_3.37 //
analyzed: ardha upabhuktena bisena jāyām saṃbhāvayām āsa rathāṅga nāmā

original: gītāntareṣu śramavārileśaiḥ kiṃcitsamucchvāsitapatralekham /
analyzed: gīta antareṣu śrama vāri leśaiḥ kiṃcid samucchvāsita patra lekham

original: puṣpāsavāghūrṇitanetraśobhi priyāmukhaṃ kiṃpuruṣaś cucumbe // Ks_3.38 //
analyzed: puṣpa āsava āghūrṇita netra śobhi priyā mukham kiṃpuruṣaḥ cucumbe

original: paryāptapuṣpastabakastanābhyaḥ sphuratpravālauṣṭhamanoharābhyaḥ /
analyzed: paryāpta puṣpa stabaka stanābhyaḥ sphurat pravāla oṣṭha manoharābhyaḥ

original: latāvadhūbhyas taravo 'py avāpur vinamraśākhābhujabandhanāni // Ks_3.39 //
analyzed: latā vadhūbhyaḥ taravaḥ pi avāpuḥ vinamra śākhā bhuja bandhanāni

original: śrutāpsarogītir api kṣaṇe 'smin haraḥ prasaṃkhyānaparo babhūva /
analyzed: śruta apsaraḥ gītiḥ api kṣaṇe smin haraḥ prasaṃkhyāna paraḥ babhūva

original: ātmeśvarāṇāṃ na hi jātu vighnāḥ samādhibhedaprabhavo bhavanti // Ks_3.40 //
analyzed: ātma īśvarāṇām na hi jātu vighnāḥ samādhi bheda prabhavaḥ bhavanti

original: latāgṛhadvāragato 'tha nandī vāmaprakoṣṭhārpitahemavetraḥ /
analyzed: latāgṛha dvāra gataḥ nandī vāma prakoṣṭha arpita hema vetraḥ

original: mukhārpitaikāṅgulisaṃjñayaiva mā cāpalāyeti gaṇān vyanaiṣīt // Ks_3.41 //
analyzed: mukha arpita eka aṅguli saṃjñayā eva mā cāpalāya iti gaṇān vyanaiṣīt

original: niṣkampavṛkṣaṃ nibhṛtadvirephaṃ mūkāṇḍajaṃ śāntamṛgapracāram /
analyzed: niṣkampa vṛkṣam nibhṛta dvirepham mūka aṇḍajam śānta mṛga pracāram

original: tacchāsanāt kānanam eva sarvaṃ citrārpitārambham ivāvatasthe // Ks_3.42 //
analyzed: tad śāsanāt kānanam eva sarvam citra arpita ārambham iva avatasthe

original: dṛṣṭiprapātaṃ parihṛtya tasya kāmaḥ puraḥśukram iva prayāṇe /
analyzed: dṛṣṭi prapātam parihṛtya tasya kāmaḥ puras śukram iva prayāṇe

original: prānteṣu saṃsaktanameruśākhaṃ dhyānāspadaṃ bhūtapater viveśa // Ks_3.43 //
analyzed: prānteṣu saṃsakta nameru śākham dhyāna āspadam bhūtapateḥ viveśa

original: sa devadārudrumavedikāyāṃ śārdūlacarmavyavadhānavatyām /
analyzed: sa devadāru druma vedikāyām śārdūla carma vyavadhānavatyām

original: āsīnam āsannaśarīrapātas tryambakaṃ saṃyaminaṃ dadarśa // Ks_3.44 //
analyzed: āsīnam āsanna śarīrapātaḥ tryambakam saṃyaminam dadarśa

original: paryaṅkabandhasthirapūrvakāyam ṛjvāyataṃ saṃnamitobhayāṃsam /
analyzed: paryaṅka bandha sthira pūrva kāyam ṛju āyatam saṃnamita ubhaya aṃsam

original: uttānapāṇidvayasaṃniveśāt praphullarājīvam ivāṅkamadhye // Ks_3.45 //
analyzed: uttāna pāṇi dvaya saṃniveśāt praphulla rājīvam iva aṅka madhye

original: bhujaṃgamonnaddhajaṭākalāpaṃ karṇāvasaktadviguṇākṣasūtram /
analyzed: bhujaṃgama unnaddha jaṭā kalāpam karṇa avasakta dviguṇa akṣa sūtram

original: kaṇṭhaprabhāsaṅgaviśeṣanīlāṃ kṛṣṇatvacaṃ granthimatīṃ dadhānam // Ks_3.46 //
analyzed: kaṇṭha prabhā saṅga viśeṣa nīlām kṛṣṇa tvacam granthimatīm dadhānam

original: kiṃcitprakāśastimitogratārair bhrūvikriyāyāṃ virataprasaṅgaiḥ /
analyzed: kiṃcid prakāśa stimita ugra tāraiḥ bhrūvikriyāyām virata prasaṅgaiḥ

original: netrair avispanditapakṣmamālair lakṣyīkṛtaghrāṇam adhomayūkhaiḥ // Ks_3.47 //
analyzed: netraiḥ a vispandita pakṣma mālaiḥ lakṣyīkṛta ghrāṇam adhas mayūkhaiḥ

original: avṛṣṭisaṃrambham ivāmbuvāham apām ivādhāram anuttaraṅgam /
analyzed: avṛṣṭi saṃrambham iva ambuvāham apām iva ādhāram anuttaraṅgam

original: antaścarāṇāṃ marutāṃ nirodhān nivātaniṣkampam iva pradīpam // Ks_3.48 //
analyzed: antar carāṇām marutām nirodhāt nivāta niṣkampam iva pradīpam

original: kapālanetrāntaralabdhamārgair jyotiḥprarohair uditaiḥ śirastaḥ /
analyzed: kapāla netra antara labdha mārgaiḥ jyotiḥ prarohaiḥ uditaiḥ śirastaḥ

original: mṛṇālasūtrādhikasaukumāryāṃ bālasya lakṣmīṃ glapayantam indoḥ // Ks_3.49 //
analyzed: mṛṇāla sūtra adhika saukumāryām bālasya lakṣmīm glapayantam indoḥ

original: mano navadvāraniṣiddhavṛtti hṛdi vyavasthāpya samādhivaśyam /
analyzed: manaḥ nava dvāra niṣiddha vṛtti hṛdi vyavasthāpya samādhi vaśyam

original: yam akṣaraṃ kṣetravido vidus tam ātmānam ātmany avalokayantam // Ks_3.50 //
analyzed: yam akṣaram kṣetravidaḥ viduḥ tam ātmānam ātmani avalokayantam

original: smaras tathābhūtam ayugmanetraṃ paśyann adūrān manasāpy adhṛṣyam /
analyzed: smaraḥ tathābhūtam ayugmanetram paśyan adūrāt manasā api adhṛṣyam

original: nālakṣayat sādhvasasannahastaḥ srastaṃ śaraṃ cāpam api svahastāt // Ks_3.51 //
analyzed: na alakṣayat sādhvasa sanna hastaḥ srastam śaram cāpam api sva hastāt

original: nirvāṇabhūyiṣṭham athāsya vīryaṃ saṃdhukṣayantīva vapurguṇena /
analyzed: nirvāṇa bhūyiṣṭham atha asya vīryam saṃdhukṣayanti iva vapuḥ guṇena

original: anuprayātā vanadevatābhyām adṛśyata sthāvararājakanyā // Ks_3.52 //
analyzed: anuprayātā vana devatābhyām adṛśyata sthāvararāja kanyā

original: aśokanirbhartsitapadmarāgam ākṛṣṭahemadyutikarṇikāram /
analyzed: aśoka nirbhartsita padmarāgam ākṛṣṭa hema dyuti karṇikāram

original: muktākalāpīkṛtasinduvāraṃ vasantapuṣpābharaṇaṃ vahantī // Ks_3.53 //
analyzed: muktā kalāpīkṛta sinduvāram vasanta puṣpa ābharaṇam vahantī

original: āvarjitā kiṃ cid iva stanābhyāṃ vāso vasānā taruṇārkarāgam /
analyzed: āvarjitā kim cit iva stanābhyām vāsaḥ vasānā taruṇa arka rāgam

original: paryāptapuṣpastabakāvanamrā saṃcāriṇī pallavinī lateva // Ks_3.54 //
analyzed: paryāpta puṣpa stabaka avanamrā saṃcāriṇī pallavinī latā iva

original: srastāṃ nitambād avalambamānā punaḥ-punaḥ kesaradāmakāñcīm /
analyzed: srastām nitambāt avalambamānā punar punar kesara dāma kāñcīm

original: nyāsīkṛtāṃ sthānavidā smareṇa maurvīṃ dvitīyām iva kārmukasya // Ks_3.55 //
analyzed: nyāsīkṛtām sthāna vidā smareṇa maurvīm dvitīyām iva kārmukasya

original: sugandhiniḥśvāsavivṛddhatṛṣṇaṃ bimbādharāsannacaraṃ dvirepham /
analyzed: sugandhi niḥśvāsa vivṛddha tṛṣṇam bimba adhara āsanna caram dvirepham

original: pratikṣaṇaṃ saṃbhramaloladṛṣṭir līlāravindena nivārayantī // Ks_3.56 //
analyzed: pratikṣaṇam saṃbhrama lola dṛṣṭiḥ līlā aravindena nivārayantī

original: tāṃ vīkṣya sarvāvayavānavadyāṃ rater api hrīpadam ādadhānām /
analyzed: tām vīkṣya sarva avayava anavadyām rateḥ api hrī padam ādadhānām

original: jitendriye śūlini puṣpacāpaḥ svakāryasiddhiṃ punar āśaśaṃse // Ks_3.57 //
analyzed: jita indriye śūlini puṣpa cāpaḥ sva kārya siddhim punar āśaśaṃse

original: bhaviṣyataḥ patyur umā ca śaṃbhoḥ samāsasāda pratihārabhūmim /
analyzed: bhaviṣyataḥ patyuḥ umā ca śaṃbhoḥ samāsasāda pratihāra bhūmim

original: yogāt sa cāntaḥ paramātmasaṃjñaṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ jyotir upārarāma // Ks_3.58 //
analyzed: yogāt sa ca antar paramātma saṃjñam dṛṣṭvā param jyotiḥ upārarāma

original: tato bhujaṃgādhipateḥ phaṇāgrair adhaḥ kathaṃ cid dhṛtabhūmibhāgaḥ /
analyzed: tatas bhujaṃga adhipateḥ phaṇa agraiḥ adhas katham cit dhṛta bhūmi bhāgaḥ

original: śanaiḥ kṛtaprāṇavimuktir īśaḥ paryaṅkabandhaṃ nibiḍaṃ bibheda // Ks_3.59 //
analyzed: śanais kṛta prāṇa vimuktiḥ īśaḥ paryaṅka bandham nibiḍam bibheda

original: tasmai śaśaṃsa praṇipatya nandī śuśrūṣayā śailasutām upetām /
analyzed: tasmai śaśaṃsa praṇipatya nandī śuśrūṣayā śailasutām upetām

original: praveśayām āsa ca bhartur enāṃ bhrūkṣepamātrānumatapraveśām // Ks_3.60 //
analyzed: praveśayām āsa ca bhartuḥ enām bhrū kṣepa mātra anumata praveśām

original: tasyāḥ sakhībhyāṃ praṇipātapūrvaṃ svahastalūnaḥ śiśirātyayasya /
analyzed: tasyāḥ sakhībhyām praṇipāta pūrvam sva hasta lūnaḥ śiśirātyayasya

original: vyakīryata tryambakapādamūle puṣpoccayaḥ pallavabhaṅgabhinnaḥ // Ks_3.61 //
analyzed: vyakīryata tryambaka pāda mūle puṣpa uccayaḥ pallava bhaṅga bhinnaḥ

original: umāpi nīlālakamadhyaśobhi visraṃsayantī navakarṇikāram /
analyzed: umā api nīla alaka madhya śobhi visraṃsayantī nava karṇikāram

original: cakāra karṇacyutapallavena mūrdhnā praṇāmaṃ vṛṣabhadhvajāya // Ks_3.62 //
analyzed: cakāra karṇa cyuta pallavena mūrdhnā praṇāmam vṛṣabhadhvajāya

original: ananyabhājaṃ patim āpnuhīti sā tathyam evābhihitā bhavena /
analyzed: ananya bhājam patim āpnuhi iti sā tathyam eva abhihitā bhavena

original: na hīśvaravyāhṛtayaḥ kadā cit puṣyanti loke viparītam artham // Ks_3.63 //
analyzed: na hi īśvara vyāhṛtayaḥ kadā cit puṣyanti loke viparītam artham

original: kāmas tu bāṇāvasaraṃ pratīkṣya pataṅgavad vahnimukhaṃ vivikṣuḥ /
analyzed: kāmaḥ tu bāṇa avasaram pratīkṣya pataṅga vat vahni mukham vivikṣuḥ

original: umāsamakṣaṃ harabaddhalakṣyaḥ śarāsanajyāṃ muhur āmamarśa // Ks_3.64 //
analyzed: umā samakṣam hara baddha lakṣyaḥ śarāsana jyām muhur āmamarśa

original: athopaninye giriśāya gaurī tapasvine tāmrarucā kareṇa /
analyzed: athā upaninye giriśāya gaurī tapasvine tāmra rucā kareṇa

original: viśoṣitāṃ bhānumato mayūkhair mandākinīpuṣkarabījamālām // Ks_3.65 //
analyzed: viśoṣitām bhānumataḥ mayūkhaiḥ mandākinī puṣkara bīja mālām

original: pratigrahītuṃ praṇayipriyatvāt trilocanas tām upacakrame ca /
analyzed: pratigrahītum praṇayi priya tvāt trilocanaḥ tām upacakrame ca

original: saṃmohanaṃ nāma ca puṣpadhanvā dhanuṣy amoghaṃ samadhatta bāṇam // Ks_3.66 //
analyzed: saṃmohanam nāma ca puṣpadhanvā dhanuṣi amogham samadhatta bāṇam

original: haras tu kiṃcitpariluptadhairyaś candrodayārambha ivāmburāśiḥ /
analyzed: haraḥ tu kiṃcid parilupta dhairyaḥ candra udaya ārambhe iva amburāśiḥ

original: umāmukhe bimbaphalādharoṣṭhe vyāpārayām āsa vilocanāni // Ks_3.67 //
analyzed: umā mukhe bimba phala adhara uṣṭhe vyāpārayām āsa vilocanāni

original: vivṛṇvatī śailasutāpi bhāvam aṅgaiḥ sphuradbālakadambakalpaiḥ /
analyzed: vivṛṇvatī śailasutā api bhāvam aṅgaiḥ sphurat bāla kadamba kalpaiḥ

original: sācīkṛtā cārutareṇa tasthau mukhena paryastavilocanena // Ks_3.68 //
analyzed: sācīkṛtā cārutareṇa tasthau mukhena paryasta vilocanena

original: athendriyakṣobham ayugmanetraḥ punar vaśitvād balavan nigṛhya /
analyzed: atha indriya kṣobham ayugmanetraḥ punar vaśi tvāt balavat nigṛhya

original: hetuṃ svacetovikṛter didṛkṣur diśām upānteṣu sasarja dṛṣṭim // Ks_3.69 //
analyzed: hetum sva cetaḥ vikṛteḥ didṛkṣuḥ diśām upānteṣu sasarja dṛṣṭim

original: sa dakṣiṇāpāṅganiviṣṭamuṣṭiṃ natāṃsam ākuñcitasavyapādam /
analyzed: sa dakṣiṇa apāṅga niviṣṭa muṣṭim nata aṃsam ākuñcita savya pādam

original: dadarśa cakrīkṛtacārucāpaṃ prahartum abhyudyatam ātmayonim // Ks_3.70 //
analyzed: dadarśa cakrīkṛta cāru cāpam prahartum abhyudyatam ātmayonim

original: tapaḥparāmarśavivṛddhamanyor bhrūbhaṅgaduṣprekṣyamukhasya tasya /
analyzed: tapaḥ parāmarśa vivṛddha manyoḥ bhrū bhaṅga duṣprekṣya mukhasya tasya

original: sphurann udarciḥ sahasā tṛtīyād akṣṇaḥ kṛśānuḥ kila niṣpapāta // Ks_3.71 //
analyzed: sphuran udarciḥ sahasā tṛtīyāt akṣṇaḥ kṛśānuḥ kila niṣpapāta

original: krodhaṃ prabho saṃhara saṃhareti yāvad giraḥ khe marutāṃ caranti /
analyzed: krodham prabho saṃhara saṃhara iti yāvat giraḥ khe marutām caranti

original: tāvat sa vahnir bhavanetrajanmā bhasmāvaśeṣaṃ madanaṃ cakāra // Ks_3.72 //
analyzed: tāvat sa vahniḥ bhava netra janmā bhasma avaśeṣam madanam cakāra

original: tīvrābhiṣaṅgaprabhaveṇa vṛttim mohena saṃstambhayatendriyāṇām /
analyzed: tīvra abhiṣaṅga prabhaveṇa vṛttim mohena saṃstambhayatā indriyāṇām

original: ajñātabhartṛvyasanā muhūrtaṃ kṛtopakāreva ratir babhūva // Ks_3.73 //
analyzed: ajñāta bhartṛ vyasanā muhūrtam kṛta upakārā iva ratiḥ babhūva

original: tam āśu vighnaṃ tapasas tapasvī vanaspatiṃ vajra ivāvabhajya /
analyzed: tam āśu vighnam tapasaḥ tapasvī vanaspatim vajraḥ iva avabhajya

original: strīsaṃnikarṣaṃ parihartum icchann antardadhe bhūtapatiḥ sabhūtaḥ // Ks_3.74 //
analyzed: strī saṃnikarṣam parihartum icchan antardadhe bhūtapatiḥ sa bhūtaḥ

original: śailātmajāpi pitur ucchiraso 'bhilāṣaṃ vyarthaṃ samarthya lalitaṃ vapur ātmanaś ca /
analyzed: śaila ātmajā api pituḥ ucchirasaḥ bhilāṣam vyartham samarthya lalitam vapuḥ ātmanaḥ ca

original: sakhyoḥ samakṣam iti cādhikajātalajjā śūnyā jagāma bhavanābhimukhī kathaṃ cit // Ks_3.75 //
analyzed: sakhyoḥ samakṣam iti ca adhika jāta lajjā śūnyā jagāma bhavana abhimukhī kathaṃ cit

original: sapadi mukulitākṣīṃ rudrasaṃrambhabhītyā duhitaram anukampyām adrir ādāya dorbhyām /
analyzed: sapadi mukulita akṣīm rudra saṃrambha bhītyā duhitaram anukampyām adriḥ ādāya dorbhyām

original: suragaja iva bibhrat padminīṃ dantalagnāṃ pratipathagatir āsīd vegadīrghīkṛtāṅgaḥ // Ks_3.76 //
analyzed: sura gajaḥ iva bibhrat padminīm danta lagnām pratipatha gatiḥ āsīt vega dīrghīkṛta aṅgaḥ

original: atha mohaparāyaṇā satī vivaśā kāmavadhūr vibodhitā /
analyzed: atha moha parāyaṇā satī vivaśā kāma vadhūḥ vibodhitā

original: vidhinā pratipādayiṣyatā navavaidhavyam asahyavedanam // Ks_4.1 //
analyzed: vidhinā pratipādayiṣyatā nava vaidhavyam asahya vedanam

original: avadhānapare cakāra sā pralayāntonmiṣite vilocane /
analyzed: avadhāna pare cakāra sā pralaya anta unmiṣite vilocane

original: na viveda tayor atṛptayoḥ priyam atyantaviluptadarśanam // Ks_4.2 //
analyzed: na viveda tayoḥ atṛptayoḥ priyam atyanta vilupta darśanam

original: ayi jīvitanātha jīvasīty abhidhāyotthitayā tayā puraḥ /
analyzed: ayi jīvitanātha jīvasi iti abhidhāya utthitayā tayā puras

original: dadṛśe puruṣākṛti kṣitau harakopānalabhasma kevalam // Ks_4.3 //
analyzed: dadṛśe puruṣa ākṛti kṣitau hara kopa anala bhasma kevalam

original: atha sā punar eva vihvalā vasudhāliṅganadhūsarastanī /
analyzed: atha sā punar eva vihvalā vasudhā āliṅgana dhūsara stanī

original: vilalāpa vikīrṇamūrdhajā samaduḥkhām iva kurvatī sthalīm // Ks_4.4 //
analyzed: vilalāpa vikīrṇa mūrdhajā sama duḥkhām iva kurvatī sthalīm

original: upamānam abhūd vilāsināṃ karaṇaṃ yat tava kāntimattayā /
analyzed: upamānam abhūt vilāsinām karaṇam yat tava kāntimat tayā

original: tad idaṃ gatam īdṛśīṃ daśāṃ na vidīrye kaṭhināḥ khalu striyaḥ // Ks_4.5 //
analyzed: tat idam gatam īdṛśīm daśām na vidīrye kaṭhināḥ khalu striyaḥ

original: kva nu māṃ tvadadhīnajīvitāṃ vinikīrya kṣaṇabhinnasauhṛdaḥ /
analyzed: kva nu mām tvad adhīna jīvitām vinikīrya kṣaṇa bhinna sauhṛdaḥ

original: nalinīṃ kṣatasetubandhano jalasaṃghāta ivāsi vidrutaḥ // Ks_4.6 //
analyzed: nalinīm kṣata setu bandhanaḥ jala saṃghātaḥ iva asi vidrutaḥ

original: kṛtavān asi vipriyaṃ na me pratikūlaṃ na ca te mayā kṛtam /
analyzed: kṛtavān asi vipriyam na me pratikūlam na ca te mayā kṛtam

original: kim akāraṇam eva darśanaṃ vilapantyai rataye na dīyate // Ks_4.7 //
analyzed: kim akāraṇam eva darśanam vilapantyai rataye na dīyate

original: smarasi smara mekhalāguṇair uta gotraskhaliteṣu bandhanam /
analyzed: smarasi smara mekhalā guṇaiḥ uta gotra skhaliteṣu bandhanam

original: cyutakeśaradūṣitekṣaṇāny avataṃsotpalatāḍanāni vā // Ks_4.8 //
analyzed: cyuta keśara dūṣita īkṣaṇāni avataṃsa utpala tāḍanāni vā

original: hṛdaye vasasīti matpriyaṃ yad avocas tad avaimi kaitavam /
analyzed: hṛdaye vasasi iti mad priyam yat avocaḥ tat avaimi kaitavam

original: upacārapadaṃ na ced idaṃ tvam anaṅgaḥ katham akṣatā ratiḥ // Ks_4.9 //
analyzed: upacāra padam na ced idam tvam anaṅgaḥ katham akṣatā ratiḥ

original: paralokanavapravāsinaḥ pratipatsye padavīm ahaṃ tava /
analyzed: para loka nava pravāsinaḥ pratipatsye padavīm aham tava

original: vidhinā jana eṣa vañcitas tvadadhīnaṃ khalu dehināṃ sukham // Ks_4.10 //
analyzed: vidhinā janaḥ eṣa vañcitaḥ tvad adhīnam khalu dehinām sukham

original: rajanītimirāvaguṇṭhite puramārge ghanaśabdaviklavāḥ /
analyzed: rajanī timira avaguṇṭhite pura mārge ghana śabda viklavāḥ

original: vasatiṃ priya kāmināṃ priyās tvad ṛte prāpayituṃ ka īśvaraḥ // Ks_4.11 //
analyzed: vasatim priya kāminām priyāḥ tvat ṛte prāpayitum kaḥ īśvaraḥ

original: nayanāny aruṇāni ghūrṇayan vacanāni skhalayan pade-pade /
analyzed: nayanāni aruṇāni ghūrṇayan vacanāni skhalayan pade pade

original: asati tvayi vāruṇīmadaḥ pramadānām adhunā viḍambanā // Ks_4.12 //
analyzed: asati tvayi vāruṇī madaḥ pramadānām adhunā viḍambanā

original: avagamya kathīkṛtaṃ vapuḥ priyabandhos tava niṣphalodayaḥ /
analyzed: avagamya kathīkṛtam vapuḥ priya bandhoḥ tava niṣphala udayaḥ

original: bahule 'pi gate niśākaras tanutāṃ duḥkham anaṅga mokṣyati // Ks_4.13 //
analyzed: bahule pi gate niśākaraḥ tanu tām duḥkham anaṅga mokṣyati

original: haritāruṇacārubandhanaḥ kalapuṃskokilaśabdasūcitaḥ /
analyzed: harita aruṇa cāru bandhanaḥ kala puṃskokila śabda sūcitaḥ

original: vada saṃprati kasya bāṇatāṃ navacūtaprasavo gamiṣyati // Ks_4.14 //
analyzed: vada saṃprati kasya bāṇa tām nava cūta prasavaḥ gamiṣyati

original: alipaṅktir anekaśas tvayā guṇakṛtye dhanuṣo niyojitā /
analyzed: ali paṅktiḥ anekaśas tvayā guṇa kṛtye dhanuṣaḥ niyojitā

original: virutaiḥ karuṇasvanair iyaṃ guruśokām anuroditīva mām // Ks_4.15 //
analyzed: virutaiḥ karuṇa svanaiḥ iyam guru śokām anuroditi iva mām

original: pratipadya manoharaṃ vapuḥ punar apy ādiśa tāvad utthitaḥ /
analyzed: pratipadya manoharam vapuḥ punar api ādiśa tāvat utthitaḥ

original: ratidūtipadeṣu kokilāṃ madhurālāpanisargapaṇḍitām // Ks_4.16 //
analyzed: rati dūtī padeṣu kokilām madhura ālāpa nisarga paṇḍitām

original: śirasā praṇipatya yācitāny upagūḍhāni savepathūni ca /
analyzed: śirasā praṇipatya yācitāni upagūḍhāni sa vepathūni ca

original: suratāni ca tāni te rahaḥ smara saṃsmṛtya na śāntir asti me // Ks_4.17 //
analyzed: suratāni ca tāni te rahaḥ smara saṃsmṛtya na śāntiḥ asti me

original: racitaṃ ratipaṇḍita tvayā svayam aṅgeṣu mamedam ārtavam /
analyzed: racitam rati paṇḍita tvayā svayam aṅgeṣu mama idam ārtavam

original: dhriyate kusumaprasādhanaṃ tava tac cāru vapur na dṛśyate // Ks_4.18 //
analyzed: dhriyate kusuma prasādhanam tava tat cāru vapuḥ na dṛśyate

original: vibudhair asi yasya dāruṇair asamāpte parikarmaṇi smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: vibudhaiḥ asi yasya dāruṇaiḥ asamāpte parikarmaṇi smṛtaḥ

original: tam imaṃ kuru dakṣiṇetaraṃ caraṇaṃ nirmitarāgam ehi me // Ks_4.19 //
analyzed: tam imam kuru dakṣiṇetaram caraṇam nirmita rāgam ehi me

original: aham etya pataṅgavartmanā punar aṅkāśrayiṇī bhavāmi te /
analyzed: aham etya pataṅga vartmanā punar aṅka āśrayiṇī bhavāmi te

original: caturaiḥ surakāminījanaiḥ priya yāvan na vilobhyase divi // Ks_4.20 //
analyzed: caturaiḥ sura kāminī janaiḥ priya yāvat na vilobhyase divi

original: madanena vinākṛtā ratiḥ kṣaṇamātraṃ kila jīviteti me /
analyzed: madanena vinākṛtā ratiḥ kṣaṇa mātram kila jīvita iti me

original: vacanīyam idaṃ vyavasthitaṃ ramaṇa tvām anuyāmi yady api // Ks_4.21 //
analyzed: vacanīyam idam vyavasthitam ramaṇa tvām anuyāmi yadi api

original: kriyatāṃ katham antyamaṇḍanaṃ paralokāntaritasya te mayā /
analyzed: kriyatām katham antya maṇḍanam para loka antaritasya te mayā

original: samam eva gato 'sy atarkitāṃ gatim aṅgena ca jīvitena ca // Ks_4.22 //
analyzed: samam eva gataḥ si a tarkitām gatim aṅgena ca jīvitena ca

original: ṛjutāṃ nayataḥ smarāmi te śaram utsaṅganiṣaṇṇadhanvanaḥ /
analyzed: ṛju tām nayataḥ smarāmi te śaram utsaṅga niṣaṇṇa dhanvanaḥ

original: madhunā saha sasmitaṃ kathāṃ nayanopāntavilokitaṃ ca yat // Ks_4.23 //
analyzed: madhunā saha sa smitam kathām nayana upānta vilokitam ca yat

original: kva nu te hṛdayaṃgamaḥ sakhā kusumāyojitakārmuko madhuḥ /
analyzed: kva nu te hṛdayaṃgamaḥ sakhā kusuma āyojita kārmukaḥ madhuḥ

original: na khalūgraruṣā pinākinā gamitaḥ so 'pi suhṛdgatāṃ gatim // Ks_4.24 //
analyzed: na khalu ugra ruṣā pinākinā gamitaḥ saḥ suhṛd gatām gatim

original: atha taiḥ paridevitākṣarair hṛdaye digdhaśarair ivārditaḥ /
analyzed: atha taiḥ paridevita akṣaraiḥ hṛdaye digdha śaraiḥ iva arditaḥ

original: ratim abhyupapattum āturāṃ madhur ātmānam adarśayat puraḥ // Ks_4.25 //
analyzed: ratim abhyupapattum āturām madhuḥ ātmānam adarśayat puras

original: tam avekṣya ruroda sā bhṛśaṃ stanasaṃbādham uro jaghāna ca /
analyzed: tam avekṣya ruroda sā bhṛśam stana saṃbādham uraḥ jaghāna ca

original: svajanasya hi duḥkham agrato vivṛtadvāram ivopajāyate // Ks_4.26 //
analyzed: sva janasya hi duḥkham agratas vivṛta dvāram iva upajāyate

original: iti cainam uvāca duḥkhitā suhṛdaḥ paśya vasanta kiṃ sthitam /
analyzed: iti ca enam uvāca duḥkhitā suhṛdaḥ paśya vasanta kim sthitam

original: yad idaṃ kaṇaśaḥ prakīryate pavanair bhasma kapotakarburam // Ks_4.27 //
analyzed: yat idam kaṇaśas prakīryate pavanaiḥ bhasma kapota karburam

original: ayi saṃprati dehi darśanaṃ smara paryutsuka eṣa mādhavaḥ /
analyzed: ayi saṃprati dehi darśanam smara paryutsukaḥ eṣa mādhavaḥ

original: dayitāsv anavasthitaṃ nṛṇāṃ na khalu prema calaṃ suhṛjjane // Ks_4.28 //
analyzed: dayitāsu anavasthitam nṛṇām na khalu prema calam suhṛd jane

original: amunā nanu pārśvavartinā jagad ājñāṃ sasurāsuraṃ tava /
analyzed: amunā nanu pārśva vartinā jagat ājñām sa sura asuram tava

original: bisatantuguṇasya kāritaṃ dhanuṣaḥ pelavapuṣpapatriṇaḥ // Ks_4.29 //
analyzed: bisa tantu guṇasya kāritam dhanuṣaḥ pelava puṣpa patriṇaḥ

original: gata eva na te nivartate sa sakhā dīpa ivānilāhataḥ /
analyzed: gataḥ eva na te nivartate sa sakhā dīpe iva anila āhataḥ

original: aham asya daśeva paśya mām aviṣahyavyasanapradhūṣitām // Ks_4.30 //
analyzed: aham asya daśā iva paśya mām aviṣahya vyasana pradhūṣitām

original: vidhinā kṛtam ardhavaiśasaṃ nanu mām kāmavadhe vimuñcatā /
analyzed: vidhinā kṛtam ardha vaiśasam nanu mām kāma vadhe vimuñcatā

original: anaghāpi hi saṃśrayadrume gajabhagne patanāya vallarī // Ks_4.31 //
analyzed: anaghā api hi saṃśraya drume gaja bhagne patanāya vallarī

original: tad idaṃ kriyatām anantaraṃ bhavatā bandhujanaprayojanam /
analyzed: tat idam kriyatām anantaram bhavatā bandhu jana prayojanam

original: vidhurāṃ jvalanātisarjanān nanu māṃ prāpaya patyur antikam // Ks_4.32 //
analyzed: vidhurām jvalana atisarjanāt nanu mām prāpaya patyuḥ antikam

original: śaśinā saha yāti kaumudī saha meghena taḍit pralīyate /
analyzed: śaśinā saha yāti kaumudī saha meghena taḍit pralīyate

original: pramadāḥ pativartmagā iti pratipannaṃ hi vicetanair api // Ks_4.33 //
analyzed: pramadāḥ pati vartma gāḥ iti pratipannam hi vicetanaiḥ api

original: amunaiva kaṣāyitastanī subhagena priyagātrabhasmanā /
analyzed: amunā eva kaṣāyita stanī subhagena priya gātra bhasmanā

original: navapallavasaṃstare yathā racayiṣyāmi tanuṃ vibhāvasau // Ks_4.34 //
analyzed: nava pallava saṃstare yathā racayiṣyāmi tanum vibhāvasau

original: kusumāstaraṇe sahāyatāṃ bahuśaḥ saumya gatas tvam āvayoḥ /
analyzed: kusuma āstaraṇe sahāya tām bahuśas saumya gataḥ tvam āvayoḥ

original: kuru saṃprati tāvad āśu me praṇipātāñjaliyācitaś citām // Ks_4.35 //
analyzed: kuru saṃprati tāvat āśu me praṇipāta añjali yācitaḥ citām

original: tad anu jvalanaṃ madarpitaṃ tvarayer dakṣiṇavātavījanaiḥ /
analyzed: tat anu jvalanam mad arpitam tvarayeḥ dakṣiṇa vāta vījanaiḥ

original: viditaṃ khalu te yathā smaraḥ kṣaṇam apy utsahate na māṃ vinā // Ks_4.36 //
analyzed: viditam khalu te yathā smaraḥ kṣaṇam api utsahate na mām vinā

original: iti cāpi vidhāya dīyatāṃ salilasyāñjalir eka eva nau /
analyzed: iti ca api vidhāya dīyatām salilasya añjaliḥ ekaḥ eva nau

original: avibhajya paratra taṃ mayā sahitaḥ pāsyati te sa bāndhavaḥ // Ks_4.37 //
analyzed: a vibhajya paratra tam mayā sahitaḥ pāsyati te sa bāndhavaḥ

original: paralokavidhau ca mādhava smaram uddiśya vilolapallavāḥ /
analyzed: para loka vidhau ca mādhava smaram uddiśya vilola pallavāḥ

original: nivapeḥ sahakāramañjarīḥ priyacūtaprasavo hi te sakhā // Ks_4.38 //
analyzed: nivapeḥ sahakāra mañjarīḥ priya cūta prasavaḥ hi te sakhā

original: iti devavimuktaye sthitāṃ ratim ākāśabhavā sarasvatī /
analyzed: iti deva vimuktaye sthitām ratim ākāśa bhavā sarasvatī

original: śapharīṃ hradaśoṣaviklavāṃ prathamā vṛṣṭir ivānvakampata // Ks_4.39 //
analyzed: śapharīm hrada śoṣa viklavām prathamā vṛṣṭiḥ iva anvakampata

original: kusumāyudhapatni durlabhas tava bhartā na cirād bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: kusumāyudha patni durlabhaḥ tava bhartā na cirāt bhaviṣyati

original: śṛṇu yena sa karmaṇā gataḥ śalabhatvaṃ haralocanārciṣi // Ks_4.40 //
analyzed: śṛṇu yena sa karmaṇā gataḥ śalabha tvam hara locana arciṣi

original: abhilāṣam udīritendriyaḥ svasutāyām akarot prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: abhilāṣam udīrita indriyaḥ sva sutāyām akarot prajāpatiḥ

original: atha tena nigṛhya vikriyām abhiśaptaḥ phalam etad anvabhūt // Ks_4.41 //
analyzed: atha tena nigṛhya vikriyām abhiśaptaḥ phalam etat anvabhūt

original: pariṇeṣyati pārvatīṃ yadā tapasā tatpravaṇīkṛto haraḥ /
analyzed: pariṇeṣyati pārvatīm yadā tapasā tad pravaṇīkṛtaḥ haraḥ

original: upalabdhasukhas tadā smaraṃ vapuṣā svena niyojayiṣyati // Ks_4.42 //
analyzed: upalabdha sukhaḥ tadā smaram vapuṣā svena niyojayiṣyati

original: iti cāha sa dharmayācitaḥ smaraśāpāvadhidāṃ sarasvatīm /
analyzed: iti ca āha sa dharma yācitaḥ smara śāpa avadhi dām sarasvatīm

original: aśaner amṛtasya cobhayor vaśinaś cāmbudharāś ca yonayaḥ // Ks_4.43 //
analyzed: aśaneḥ amṛtasya ca ubhayoḥ vaśinaḥ ca ambudharāḥ ca yonayaḥ

original: tad idaṃ parirakṣa śobhane bhavitavyapriyasaṃgamaṃ vapuḥ /
analyzed: tat idam parirakṣa śobhane bhavitavya priya saṃgamam vapuḥ

original: ravipītajalā tapātyaye punar oghena hi yujyate nadī // Ks_4.44 //
analyzed: ravi pīta jalā tapātyaye punar oghena hi yujyate nadī

original: itthaṃ rateḥ kim api bhūtam adṛśyarūpaṃ mandīcakāra maraṇavyavasāyabuddhim /
analyzed: ittham rateḥ kim api bhūtam adṛśya rūpam mandīcakāra maraṇa vyavasāya buddhim

original: tatpratyayāc ca kusumāyudhabandhur enām āśvāsayat sucaritārthapadair vacobhiḥ // Ks_4.45 //
analyzed: tad pratyayāt ca kusumāyudha bandhuḥ enām āśvāsayat su carita artha padaiḥ vacobhiḥ

original: atha madanavadhūr upaplavāntaṃ vyasanakṛśā paripālayāṃ babhūva /
analyzed: atha madana vadhūḥ upaplava antam vyasana kṛśā babhūva

original: śaśina iva divātanasya lekhā kiraṇaparikṣayadhūsarā pradoṣam // Ks_4.46 //
analyzed: śaśinaḥ iva divātanasya lekhā kiraṇa parikṣaya dhūsarā pradoṣam

original: tathā samakṣaṃ dahatā manobhavaṃ pinākinā bhagnamanorathā satī /
analyzed: tathā samakṣam dahatā manobhavam pinākinā bhagna manorathā satī

original: nininda rūpaṃ hṛdayena pārvatī priyeṣu saubhāgyaphalā hi cārutā // Ks_5.1 //
analyzed: nininda rūpam hṛdayena pārvatī priyeṣu saubhāgya phalā hi cāru tā

original: iyeṣa sā kartum avandhyarūpatāṃ samādhim āsthāya tapobhir ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: iyeṣa sā kartum avandhya rūpa tām samādhim āsthāya tapobhiḥ ātmanaḥ

original: avāpyate vā katham anyathā dvayaṃ tathāvidhaṃ prema patiś ca tādṛśaḥ // Ks_5.2 //
analyzed: avāpyate vā katham anyathā dvayam tathāvidham prema patiḥ ca tādṛśaḥ

original: niśamya caināṃ tapase kṛtodyamāṃ sutāṃ girīśapratisaktamānasām /
analyzed: niśamya ca enām tapase kṛta udyamām sutām girīśa pratisakta mānasām

original: uvāca menā parirabhya vakṣasā nivārayantī mahato munivratāt // Ks_5.3 //
analyzed: uvāca menā parirabhya vakṣasā nivārayantī mahataḥ muni vratāt

original: manīṣitāḥ santi gṛhe 'pi devatās tapaḥ kva vatse kva ca tāvakaṃ vapuḥ /
analyzed: manīṣitāḥ santi gṛhe pi devatāḥ tapaḥ kva vatse kva ca tāvakam vapuḥ

original: padaṃ saheta bhramarasya pelavaṃ śirīśapuṣpaṃ na punaḥ patatriṇaḥ // Ks_5.4 //
analyzed: padam saheta bhramarasya pelavam śirīśa puṣpam na punar patatriṇaḥ

original: iti dhruvecchām anuśāsatī sutāṃ śaśāka menā na niyantum udyamāt /
analyzed: iti dhruva icchām anuśāsatī sutām śaśāka menā na niyantum udyamāt

original: ka īpsitārthasthiraniścayaṃ manaḥ payaś ca nimnābhimukhaṃ pratīpayet // Ks_5.5 //
analyzed: kaḥ īpsita artha sthira niścayam manaḥ payaḥ ca nimna abhimukham pratīpayet

original: kadā cid āsannasakhīmukhena sā manorathajñaṃ pitaraṃ manasvinī /
analyzed: kadā cit āsanna sakhī mukhena sā manoratha jñam pitaram manasvinī

original: ayācatāraṇyanivāsam ātmanaḥ phalodayāntāya tapaḥsamādhaye // Ks_5.6 //
analyzed: ayācata araṇya nivāsam ātmanaḥ phala udaya antāya tapaḥ samādhaye

original: athānurūpābhiniveśatoṣiṇā kṛtābhyanujñā guruṇā garīyasā /
analyzed: athā anurūpa abhiniveśa toṣiṇā kṛta abhyanujñāḥ guruṇā garīyasā

original: prajāsu paścāt prathitaṃ tadākhyayā jagāma gaurī śikharaṃ śikhaṇḍimat // Ks_5.7 //
analyzed: prajāsu paścāt prathitam tad ākhyayā jagāma gaurī śikharam śikhaṇḍimat

original: vimucya sā hāram ahāryaniścayā vilolayaṣṭipraviluptacandanam /
analyzed: vimucya sā hāram ahārya niścayā vilola yaṣṭi pravilupta candanam

original: babandha bālāruṇababhru valkalaṃ payodharotsedhaviśīrṇasaṃhati // Ks_5.8 //
analyzed: babandha bālā aruṇa babhru valkalam payodhara utsedha viśīrṇa saṃhati

original: yathā prasiddhair madhuraṃ śiroruhair jaṭābhir apy evam abhūt tadānanam /
analyzed: yathā prasiddhaiḥ madhuram śiroruhaiḥ jaṭābhiḥ api evam abhūt tad ānanam

original: na śaṭpadaśreṇibhir eva paṅkajaṃ saśaivalāsaṅgam api prakāśate // Ks_5.9 //
analyzed: na śaṭpada śreṇibhiḥ eva paṅkajam sa śaivala āsaṅgam api prakāśate

original: pratikṣaṇaṃ sā kṛtaromavikriyāṃ vratāya mauñjīṃ triguṇāṃ babhāra yām /
analyzed: pratikṣaṇam sā kṛta roma vikriyām vratāya mauñjīm triguṇām babhāra yām

original: akāri tatpūrvanibaddhayā tayā sarāgam asyā rasanāguṇāspadam // Ks_5.10 //
analyzed: akāri tad pūrva nibaddhayā tayā sa rāgam asyāḥ rasanā guṇa āspadam

original: visṛṣṭarāgād adharān nivartitaḥ stanāṅgarāgāruṇitāc ca kandukāt /
analyzed: visṛṣṭa rāgāt adharāt nivartitaḥ stana aṅga rāga aruṇitāt ca kandukāt

original: kuśāṅkurādānaparikṣatāṅguliḥ kṛto 'kṣasūtrapraṇayī tayā karaḥ // Ks_5.11 //
analyzed: kuśa aṅkura ādāna parikṣata aṅguliḥ kṛta u kṣa sūtra praṇayī tayā karaḥ

analyzed: mahārha śayyā parivartana cyutaiḥ sva keśa puṣpaiḥ api yā sma dūyate

original: aśeta sā bāhulatopadhāyinī niṣeduṣī sthaṇḍila eva kevale // Ks_5.12 //
analyzed: aśeta sā bāhu latā upadhāyinī niṣeduṣī sthaṇḍile eva kevale

analyzed: punar grahītum niyama sthayā tayā dvaye nikṣepe iva arpitam dvayam

analyzed: atandritā sā svayam eva vṛkṣakān ghaṭa stana prasravaṇaiḥ vyavardhayat

analyzed: guhaḥ pi yeṣām prathama āpta janmanām na putra vātsalyam apākariṣyati

analyzed: araṇya bīja añjali dāna lālitāḥ tathā ca tasyām hariṇāḥ viśaśvasuḥ

original: yathā tadīyair nayanaiḥ kutūhalāt puraḥ sakhīnām amimīta locane // Ks_5.15 //
analyzed: yathā tadīyaiḥ nayanaiḥ kutūhalāt puras sakhīnām amimīta locane

original: kṛtābhiśekāṃ hutajātavedasaṃ tvaguttarāsaṅgavatīm adhītinīm /
analyzed: kṛta abhiśekām huta jātavedasam tvac uttarāsaṅgavatīm adhītinīm

analyzed: digdṛkṣavaḥ tām ṛṣayaḥ bhyupāgamat na dharma vṛddheṣu vayaḥ samīkṣyate

original: virodhisattvojjhitapūrvamatsaraṃ drumair abhīṣṭaprasavārcitātithi /
analyzed: virodhi sattva ujjhita pūrva matsaram drumaiḥ abhīṣṭa prasava arcita atithi

original: navoṭajābhyantarasaṃbhṛtānalaṃ tapovanaṃ tac ca babhūva pāvanam // Ks_5.17 //
analyzed: nava uṭaja abhyantara saṃbhṛta analam tapaḥ vanam tat ca babhūva pāvanam

analyzed: yadā phalam pūrva tapaḥ samādhinā na tāvatā labhyam amaṃsta kāṅkṣitam

analyzed: tadā an apekṣya sva śarīra mārdavam tapaḥ mahat sā caritum pracakrame

original: klamaṃ yayau kandukalīlayāpi yā tayā munīnāṃ caritaṃ vyagāhyata /
analyzed: klamam yayau kanduka līlayā api yā tayā munīnām caritam vyagāhyata

original: dhruvaṃ vapuḥ kāñcanapadmanirmitaṃ mṛdu prakṛtyā ca sasāram eva ca // Ks_5.19 //
analyzed: dhruvam vapuḥ kāñcana padma nirmitam mṛdu prakṛtyā ca sa sāram eva ca

original: śucau caturṇāṃ jvalatāṃ havirbhujāṃ śucismitā madhyagatā sumadhyamā /
analyzed: śucau caturṇām jvalatām havirbhujām śuci smitā madhya gatā su madhyamā

original: vijitya netrapratighātinīṃ prabhām ananyadṛṣṭiḥ savitāram aikṣata // Ks_5.20 //
analyzed: vijitya netra pratighātinīm prabhām an anya dṛṣṭiḥ savitāram aikṣata

original: tathābhitaptaṃ savitur gabhastibhir mukhaṃ tadīyaṃ kamalaśriyaṃ dadhau /
analyzed: tathā abhitaptam savituḥ gabhastibhiḥ mukham tadīyam kamala śriyam

original: apāṅgayoḥ kevalam asya dīrghayoḥ śanaiḥ-śanaiḥ śyāmikayā kṛtaṃ padam // Ks_5.21 //
analyzed: apāṅgayoḥ kevalam asya dīrghayoḥ śanais śanais śyāmikayā kṛtam padam

original: ayācitopasthitam ambu kevalaṃ rasātmakasyoḍupateś ca raśmayaḥ /
analyzed: a yācita upasthitam ambu kevalam rasa ātmakasya uḍupateḥ ca raśmayaḥ

original: babhūva tasyāḥ kila pāraṇāvidhir na vṛkṣavṛttivyatiriktasādhanaḥ // Ks_5.22 //
analyzed: babhūva tasyāḥ kila pāraṇā vidhiḥ na vṛkṣa vṛtti vyatirikta sādhanaḥ

original: nikāmataptā vividhena vahninā nabhaścareṇendhanasaṃbhṛtena ca /
analyzed: nikāma taptāḥ vividhena vahninā nabhaḥ careṇa indhana saṃbhṛtena ca

original: tapātyaye vāribhir ukṣitā navair bhuvā sahoṣmāṇam amuñcad ūrdhvagam // Ks_5.23 //
analyzed: tapātyaye vāribhiḥ ukṣitā navaiḥ bhuvā saha ūṣmāṇam amuñcat ūrdhva gam

analyzed: sthitāḥ kṣaṇam pakṣmasu tāḍita adharāḥ payodhara utsedha nipāta cūrṇitāḥ

original: valīṣu tasyāḥ skhalitāḥ prapedire cireṇa nābhiṃ prathamodabindavaḥ // Ks_5.24 //
analyzed: valīṣu tasyāḥ skhalitāḥ prapedire cireṇa nābhim prathama uda bindavaḥ

original: śilāśayāṃ tām aniketavāsinīṃ nirantarāsv antaravātavṛṣṭiṣu /
analyzed: śilā āśayām tām aniketa vāsinīm nirantarāsu antara vāta vṛṣṭiṣu

original: vyalokayann unmiṣitais taḍinmayair mahātapaḥsākṣya iva sthitāḥ kṣapāḥ // Ks_5.25 //
analyzed: vyalokayan unmiṣitaiḥ taḍit mayaiḥ mahā tapaḥ sākṣye iva sthitāḥ kṣapāḥ

original: nināya sātyantahimotkirānilāḥ sahasyarātrīr udavāsatatparā /
analyzed: nināya sā atyanta hima utkira anilāḥ sahasya rātrīḥ uda vāsa tatparā

original: parasparākrandini cakravākayoḥ puro viyukte mithune kṛpāvatī // Ks_5.26 //
analyzed: paraspara ākrandini cakravākayoḥ puras viyukte mithune kṛpāvatī

analyzed: mukhena sā padma sugandhinā niśi pravepamānā adhara patra śobhinā

original: tuṣāravṛṣṭikṣatapadmasaṃpadāṃ sarojasaṃdhānam ivākarod apām // Ks_5.27 //
analyzed: tuṣāra vṛṣṭi kṣata padma saṃpadām saroja saṃdhānam iva akarot apām

analyzed: svayam viśīrṇa druma parṇa vṛtti tā parā hi kāṣṭhā tapasaḥ tayā punar

original: tad apy apākīrṇam ataḥ priyaṃvadāṃ vadanty aparṇeti ca tāṃ purāvidaḥ // Ks_5.28 //
analyzed: tat api apākīrṇam atas priyaṃvadām vadanti aparṇā iti ca tām

original: mṛṇālikāpelavam evamādibhir vrataiḥ svam aṅgaṃ glapayanty aharniśam /
analyzed: mṛṇālikā pelavam evamādibhiḥ vrataiḥ svam aṅgam glapayantī aharniśam

analyzed: tapaḥ śarīraiḥ kaṭhinaiḥ upārjitam tapasvinām dūram adhas cakāra sā

original: athājināṣāḍhadharaḥ pragalbhavāg jvalann iva brahmamayena tejasā /
analyzed: atha ajina āṣāḍha dharaḥ pragalbha vāc jvalan iva brahma mayena tejasā

original: viveśa kaścij jaṭilas tapovanaṃ śarīrabaddhaḥ prathamāśramo yathā // Ks_5.30 //
analyzed: viveśa kaścid jaṭilaḥ tapovanam śarīra baddhaḥ prathama āśramaḥ yathā

original: tam ātitheyī bahumānapūrvayā saparyayā pratyudiyāya pārvatī /
analyzed: tam ātitheyī bahu māna pūrvayā saparyayā pratyudiyāya pārvatī

original: bhavanti sāmye 'pi niviṣṭacetasāṃ vapurviśeṣeṣv atigauravāḥ kriyāḥ // Ks_5.31 //
analyzed: bhavanti sāmye niviṣṭa cetasām vapuḥ viśeṣeṣu ati gauravāḥ kriyāḥ

original: vidhiprayuktāṃ parigṛhya satkriyāṃ pariśramaṃ nāma vinīya ca kṣaṇam /
analyzed: vidhi prayuktām parigṛhya satkriyām pariśramam nāma vinīya ca kṣaṇam

original: umāṃ sa paśyann ṛjunaiva cakṣuṣā pracakrame vaktum anujjhitakramaḥ // Ks_5.32 //
analyzed: umām sa paśyan ṛjunā eva cakṣuṣā pracakrame vaktum anujjhita kramaḥ

analyzed: api kriyā artham sulabham samidh kuśam jalāni api snāna vidhi kṣamāṇi te

original: api svaśaktyā tapasi pravartase śarīram ādyaṃ khalu dharmasādhanam // Ks_5.33 //
analyzed: api sva śaktyā tapasi pravartase śarīram ādyam khalu dharma sādhanam

original: api tvadāvarjitavārisaṃbhṛtaṃ pravālam āsām anubandhi vīrudhām /
analyzed: api tvad āvarjita vāri saṃbhṛtam pravālam āsām anubandhi vīrudhām

original: cirojjhitālaktakapāṭalena te tulāṃ yad ārohati dantavāsasā // Ks_5.34 //
analyzed: cira ujjhita alaktaka pāṭalena te tulām yat ārohati dantavāsasā

original: api prasannaṃ hariṇeṣu te manaḥ karasthadarbhapraṇayāpahāriṣu /
analyzed: api prasannam hariṇeṣu te manaḥ kara stha darbha praṇaya apahāriṣu

original: ya utpalākṣi pracalair vilocanais tavākṣisādṛśyam iva prayuñjate // Ks_5.35 //
analyzed: yaḥ utpala akṣi pracalaiḥ vilocanaiḥ tava akṣi sādṛśyam iva prayuñjate

analyzed: yat ucyate pārvati pāpa vṛttaye na rūpam iti avyabhicāri tat vacaḥ

original: tathā hi te śīlam udāradarśane tapasvinām apy upadeśatāṃ gatam // Ks_5.36 //
analyzed: tathā hi te śīlam udāra darśane tapasvinām api upadeśa tām gatam

analyzed: vikīrṇa saptarṣi bali prahāsibhiḥ tathā na gāṅgaiḥ salilaiḥ divaḥ cyutaiḥ

analyzed: yathā tvadīyaiḥ caritaiḥ anāvilaiḥ mahīdharaḥ pāvitaḥ eṣa sa anvayaḥ

analyzed: anena dharmaḥ sa viśeṣam adya me trivarga sāraḥ pratibhāti bhāvini

analyzed: tvayā manaḥ nirviṣayā artha kāmayā yat ekaḥ eva pratigṛhya sevyate

analyzed: prayukta satkāra viśeṣam ātmanā na mām param saṃpratipattum arhasi

analyzed: yatas satām saṃnata gātri saṃgatam manīṣibhiḥ sāptapadīnam ucyate

analyzed: atas tra kiṃcid bhavatīm bahu kṣamām dvijāti bhāvāt upapanna cāpalaḥ

analyzed: ayam janaḥ praṣṭu manāḥ tapodhane na ced rahasyam prativaktum arhasi

analyzed: kule prasūtiḥ prathamasya vedhasaḥ triloka saundaryam iva uditam vapuḥ

analyzed: amṛgyam aiśvarya sukham navam vayaḥ tapaḥ phalam syāt kim atas param vada

analyzed: bhavati aniṣṭāt api nāma duḥsahāt manasvinīnām pratipattiḥ īdṛśī

original: vicāramārgaprahitena cetasā na dṛśyate tac ca kṛśodari tvayi // Ks_5.42 //
analyzed: vicāra mārga prahitena cetasā na dṛśyate tat ca kṛśa udari tvayi

analyzed: alabhya śoka abhibhavā iyam ākṛtiḥ vimānanā subhru kutas pituḥ gṛhe

analyzed: para abhimarśaḥ na tava asti kaḥ karam prasārayet pannaga ratna sūcaye

analyzed: kim iti apāsya ābharaṇāni yauvane dhṛtam tvayā vārddhaka śobhi valkalam

original: vada pradoṣe sphuṭacandratārake vibhāvarī yady aruṇāya kalpate // Ks_5.44 //
analyzed: vada pradoṣe sphuṭa candra tārake vibhāvarī yadi aruṇāya kalpate

analyzed: divam yadi prārthayase vṛthā śramaḥ pituḥ pradeśāḥ tava deva bhūmayaḥ

original: athopayantāram alaṃ samādhinā na ratnam anviṣyati mṛgyate hi tat // Ks_5.45 //
analyzed: atha upayantāram alam samādhinā na ratnam anviṣyati mṛgyate hi tat

original: niveditaṃ niśvasitena soṣmaṇā manas tu me saṃśayam eva gāhate /
analyzed: niveditam niśvasitena sa ūṣmaṇā manaḥ tu me saṃśayam eva gāhate

original: na dṛśyate prārthayitavya eva te bhaviṣyati prārthitadurlabhaḥ katham // Ks_5.46 //
analyzed: na dṛśyate prārthayitavyaḥ eva te bhaviṣyati prārthita durlabhaḥ katham

analyzed: aho sthiraḥ kaḥ pi tava īpsitaḥ yuvā cirāya karṇa utpala śūnya tām gate

analyzed: upekṣate yaḥ ślatha lambinīḥ jaṭāḥ kapola deśe kalama agra piṅgalāḥ

analyzed: muni vrataiḥ tvām atimātra karśitām divākara āpluṣṭa vibhūṣaṇa āspadām

original: śaśāṅkalekhām iva paśyato divā sacetasaḥ kasya mano na dūyate // Ks_5.48 //
analyzed: śaśāṅka lekhām iva paśyataḥ divā sa cetasaḥ kasya manaḥ na dūyate

original: avaimi saubhāgyamadena vañcitaṃ tava priyaṃ yaś caturāvalokinaḥ /
analyzed: avaimi saubhāgya madena vañcitam tava priyam yaḥ catura avalokinaḥ

original: karoti lakṣyaṃ ciram asya cakṣuṣo na vaktram ātmīyam arālapakṣmaṇaḥ // Ks_5.49 //
analyzed: karoti lakṣyam ciram asya cakṣuṣaḥ na vaktram ātmīyam arāla pakṣmaṇaḥ

original: kiyac ciraṃ śrāmyasi gauri vidyate mamāpi pūrvāśramasaṃcitaṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: kiyat ciram śrāmyasi gauri vidyate mama api pūrva āśrama saṃcitam tapaḥ

original: tadardhabhāgena labhasva kāṅkṣitaṃ varaṃ tam icchāmi ca sādhu veditum // Ks_5.50 //
analyzed: tad ardha bhāgena labhasva kāṅkṣitam varam tam icchāmi ca sādhu veditum

original: iti praviśyābhihitā dvijanmanā manogataṃ sā na śaśāka śaṃsitum /
analyzed: iti praviśya abhihitā dvijanmanā manogatam sā na śaśāka śaṃsitum

original: atho vayasyāṃ paripārśvavartinīṃ vivartitānañjananetram aikṣata // Ks_5.51 //
analyzed: atho vayasyām paripārśva vartinīm vivartita anañjana netram aikṣata

original: sakhī tadīyā tam uvāca varṇinaṃ nibodha sādho tava cet kutūhalam /
analyzed: sakhī tadīyā tam uvāca varṇinam nibodha sādho tava ced kutūhalam

original: yadartham ambhojam ivoṣṇavāraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tapaḥsādhanam etayā vapuḥ // Ks_5.52 //
analyzed: yad artham ambhojam iva uṣṇa vāraṇam kṛtam tapaḥ sādhanam etayā vapuḥ

original: iyaṃ mahendraprabhṛtīn adhiśriyaś caturdigīśān avamatya māninī /
analyzed: iyam mahā indra prabhṛtīn adhiśriyaḥ catur digīśān avamatya māninī

original: arūpahāryaṃ madanasya nigrahāt pinākapāṇiṃ patim āptum icchati // Ks_5.53 //
analyzed: arūpa hāryam madanasya nigrahāt pinākapāṇim patim āptum icchati

original: asahyahuṃkāranivartitaḥ purā purārim aprāptamukhaḥ śilīmukhaḥ /
analyzed: asahya huṃkāra nivartitaḥ purā purārim aprāpta mukhaḥ śilīmukhaḥ

original: imāṃ hṛdi vyāyatapātam akṣaṇod viśīrṇamūrter api puṣpadhanvanaḥ // Ks_5.54 //
analyzed: imām hṛdi vyāyata pātam akṣaṇot viśīrṇa mūrteḥ api puṣpadhanvanaḥ

original: tadāprabhṛty unmadanā pitur gṛhe lalāṭikācandanadhūsarālakā /
analyzed: tadā prabhṛti unmadanā pituḥ gṛhe lalāṭikā candana dhūsara alakā

original: na jātu bālā labhate sma nirvṛtiṃ tuṣārasaṃghātaśilātaleṣv api // Ks_5.55 //
analyzed: na jātu bālā labhate sma nirvṛtim tuṣāra saṃghāta śilā taleṣu api

original: upāttavarṇe carite pinākinaḥ sabāṣpakaṇṭhaskhalitaiḥ padair iyam /
analyzed: upātta varṇe carite pinākinaḥ sa bāṣpa kaṇṭha skhalitaiḥ padaiḥ iyam

original: anekaśaḥ kinnararājakanyakā vanāntasaṃgītasakhīr arodayat // Ks_5.56 //
analyzed: anekaśas kinnara rāja kanyakāḥ vanānta saṃgīta sakhīḥ arodayat

original: tribhāgaśeṣāsu niśāsu ca kṣaṇam nimīlya netre sahasā vyabudhyata /
analyzed: tri bhāga śeṣāsu niśāsu ca kṣaṇam nimīlya netre sahasā vyabudhyata

original: kva nīlakaṇṭha vrajasīty alakṣyavāg asatyakaṇṭhārpitabāhubandhanā // Ks_5.57 //
analyzed: kva nīlakaṇṭha vrajasi iti alakṣya vāc asatya kaṇṭha arpita bāhu bandhanā

analyzed: yadā budhaiḥ sarva gataḥ tvam ucyase na vetsi bhāva stham imam janam katham

analyzed: tadā saha asmābhiḥ anujñayā guroḥ iyam prapannā tapase tapaḥ vanam

analyzed: na ca praroha abhimukhaḥ pi dṛśyate manorathaḥ syāḥ śaśimauli saṃśrayaḥ

analyzed: na vedmi sa prārthita durlabhaḥ kadā sakhībhiḥ asra uttaram īkṣitām imām

analyzed: tapaḥ kṛśām abhyupapatsyate sakhīm vṛṣā iva sītām tad avagraha kṣatām

analyzed: agūḍha sadbhāvam iti iṅgita jñayā niveditaḥ naiṣṭhika sundaraḥ tayā

analyzed: ayi idam evam parihāsaḥ iti umām apṛcchat a vyañjita harṣa lakṣaṇaḥ

analyzed: atha agra haste mukulīkṛta aṅgulau samarpayantī sphaṭika akṣa mālikām

analyzed: katham cit adreḥ tanayā mita akṣaram cira vyavasthāpita vāc abhāṣata

analyzed: yathā śrutam veda vidām vara tvayā janaḥ yam uccais pada laṅghana utsukaḥ

analyzed: tapaḥ kila idam tad avāpti sādhanam manorathānām agatiḥ na vidyate

analyzed: athā āha varṇī viditaḥ maheśvaraḥ tad arthinī tvam punar eva vartase

analyzed: amaṅgala abhyāsa ratim vicintya tam tava anuvṛttim na ca kartum utsahe

analyzed: avastu nirbandha pare katham nu te karaḥ yam āmukta vivāha kautukaḥ

analyzed: kareṇa śaṃbhoḥ valayīkṛta ahinā sahiṣyate tad prathama avalambanam

analyzed: tvam eva tāvat paricintaya svayam kadā cit ete yadi yogam arhataḥ

original: vadhūdukūlaṃ kalahaṃsalakṣaṇaṃ gajājinaṃ śoṇitabinduvarṣi ca // Ks_5.67 //
analyzed: vadhū dukūlam kalahaṃsa lakṣaṇam gaja ajinam śoṇita bindu varṣi ca

analyzed: catuṣka puṣpa prakara avikīrṇayoḥ paraḥ pi kaḥ nāma tava anumanyate

analyzed: alaktaka aṅkāni padāni pādayoḥ vikīrṇa keśāsu pareta bhūmiṣu

analyzed: dvayam gatam saṃprati śocanīya tām samāgama prārthanayā kapālinaḥ

analyzed: vapuḥ virūpa akṣam alakṣya janma tā digambara tvena niveditam vasu

analyzed: vareṣu yat bāla mṛga akṣi mṛgyate tat asti kim vyastam api trilocane

analyzed: nivartaya asmāt asat īpsitāt manaḥ kva tadvidhaḥ tvam kva ca puṇya lakṣaṇā

analyzed: apekṣyate sādhu janena vaidikī śmaśāna śūlasya na yūpa satkriyā

analyzed: iti dvijātau pratikūla vādini pravepamāna adhara lakṣya kopayā

analyzed: vikuñcita bhrū latam āhite tayā vilocane tiryak upānta lohite

analyzed: uvāca ca enam paramārthataḥ haram na vetsi nūnam yatas evam āttha mām

analyzed: vipad pratīkāra pareṇa maṅgalam niṣevyate bhūti samutsukena vā

analyzed: jagat śaraṇyasya sataḥ kim ebhiḥ āśā upahata ātma vṛttibhiḥ

analyzed: akiñcanaḥ san prabhavaḥ sa saṃpadām triloka nāthaḥ pitṛ sadma gocaraḥ

analyzed: sa bhīma rūpaḥ śivaḥ iti udīryate na santi yāthārthya vidaḥ pinākinaḥ

analyzed: vibhūṣaṇa udbhāsi pinaddha bhogi vā gaja ajina ālambi dukūla dhāri vā

analyzed: kapāli vā syāt atha vā indu śekharam na viśvamūrteḥ avadhāryate vapuḥ

analyzed: tad aṅga saṃsargam avāpya kalpate dhruvam citā bhasma rajaḥ viśuddhaye

analyzed: tathā hi nṛtya abhinaya kriyā cyutam vilipyate maulibhiḥ ambaraukasām

analyzed: asaṃpadaḥ tasya vṛṣeṇa gacchataḥ prabhinna digvāraṇa vāhanaḥ vṛṣā

analyzed: karoti pādau upagamya maulinā vinidra mandāra raja ūruṇā aṅgulī

analyzed: yam āmananti ātmabhuvaḥ pi kāraṇam katham sa lakṣya prabhavaḥ bhaviṣyati

analyzed: alam vivādena yathā śrutaḥ tvayā tathāvidhaḥ tāvat aśeṣam astu saḥ

analyzed: mama atra bhāva eka rasam manaḥ sthitam na kāma vṛttiḥ vacanīyam īkṣate

analyzed: nivāryatām āli kim api ayam baṭuḥ punar vivakṣuḥ sphurita uttara adharaḥ

analyzed: na kevalam yaḥ upabhāṣate śṛṇoti tasmāt api yaḥ sa pāpa bhāj

analyzed: itas athavā iti vādinī cacāla bālā stana bhinna valkalā

analyzed: sva rūpam āsthāya ca tām kṛta smitaḥ samālalambe vṛṣarājaketanaḥ

analyzed: tam vīkṣya vepathumatī sa rasa aṅgayaṣṭiḥ nikṣepaṇāya padam uddhṛtam udvahantī

analyzed: mārga acala vyatikara ākulitā iva sindhuḥ śaila adhirāja tanayā na yayau na tasthau

analyzed: sā niyama jam klamam utsasarja kleśaḥ phalena hi punar nava tām vidhatte

analyzed: atha viśvātmane gaurī saṃdideśa mithas sakhīm

analyzed: dātā me bhūbhṛtām nāthaḥ pramāṇīkriyatām iti

analyzed: tayā vyāhṛta saṃdeśā sā babhau nibhṛtā priye

analyzed: cūta yaṣṭiḥ iva abhyāṣye madhau parabhṛtāmukhī

analyzed: sa tathā iti pratijñāya visṛjya katham api umām

analyzed: ṛṣīm jyotiḥ mayān sapta sasmāra smaraśāsanaḥ

analyzed: te prabhā maṇḍalaiḥ vyoma dyotayantaḥ tapodhanāḥ

analyzed: sa arundhatīkāḥ sapadi prādur āsan puras prabhoḥ

analyzed: āplutāḥ tīra mandāra kusuma utkira vīciṣu

analyzed: ākāśagaṅgā srotaḥsu diṅnāga mada gandhiṣu

analyzed: muktā yajñopavītāni bibhrataḥ haima valkalāḥ

analyzed: ratna akṣasūtrāḥ pravrajyām kalpavṛkṣāḥ iva āśritāḥ

original: adhaḥpravarttitāśvena samāvarjitaketunā /
analyzed: adhas pravarttita aśvena samāvarjita ketunā

analyzed: sahasraraśminā śaśvat sa pramāṇam udīkṣitāḥ

analyzed: āsakta bāhu latayā sārdham uddhṛtayā bhuvā

analyzed: mahāvarāha daṃṣṭrāyām viśrāntāḥ pralaya āpadi

analyzed: purātanāḥ   dhātāraḥ iti kīrtitāḥ

original: prāktanānāṃ viśuddhānāṃ paripākam upeyuṣām /
analyzed: prāktanānām viśuddhānām paripākam upeyuṣām

analyzed: tapasām upabhuñjānāḥ phalāni api tapasvinaḥ

analyzed: teṣām madhya gatā sādhvī patyuḥ pāda arpita īkṣaṇā

analyzed: sākṣāt iva tapaḥ siddhiḥ babhāse bahu arundhatī

original: tām agauravabhedena munīṃś cāpaśyad īśvaraḥ /
analyzed: tām agaurava bhedena munīn ca apaśyat īśvaraḥ

original: strī pumān ity anāsthaiṣā vṛttaṃ hi mahitaṃ satām // Ks_6.12 //
analyzed: strī pumān iti anāsthā eṣā vṛttam hi mahitam satām

analyzed: tad darśanāt abhūt śambhoḥ bhūyān dāra artham ādaraḥ

analyzed: kriyāṇām khalu dharmyāṇām sat patnyaḥ mūla sādhanam

analyzed: dharmeṇa api padam śarve kārite pārvatīm prati

original: pūrvāparādhabhītasya kāmasyocchvāsitaṃ manaḥ // Ks_6.14 //
analyzed: pūrva aparādha bhītasya kāmasya ucchvāsitam manaḥ

original: atha te munayaḥ sarve mānayitvā jagadgurum /
analyzed: atha te munayaḥ sarve mānayitvā jagadgurum

original: idam ūcur anūcānāḥ prītikaṇṭakitatvacaḥ // Ks_6.15 //
analyzed: idam ūcuḥ anūcānāḥ prīti kaṇṭakita tvacaḥ

analyzed: yat brahma samyak āmnātam yat agnau vidhinā hutam

analyzed: yat ca taptam tapaḥ tasya vipakvam phalam adya naḥ

original: yad adhyakṣeṇa jagatāṃ vayam āropitās tvayā /
analyzed: yat adhyakṣeṇa jagatām vayam āropitāḥ tvayā

original: manorathasyāviṣayaṃ manoviṣayam ātmanaḥ // Ks_6.17 //
analyzed: manorathasya aviṣayam manaḥ viṣayam ātmanaḥ

analyzed: yasya cetasi vartethāḥ sa tāvat kṛtinām varaḥ

original: kiṃ punar brahmayoner yas tava cetasi vartate // Ks_6.18 //
analyzed: kim punar brahma yoneḥ yaḥ tava cetasi vartate

original: satyam arkāc ca somāc ca param adhyāsmahe padam /
analyzed: satyam arkāt ca somāt ca param adhyāsmahe padam

original: adya tūccaistaraṃ tasmāt smaraṇānugrahāt tava // Ks_6.19 //
analyzed: adya tu uccaistaram tasmāt smaraṇa anugrahāt tava

analyzed: tvad saṃbhāvitam ātmānam bahu manyāmahe vayam

original: prāyaḥ pratyayam ādhatte svaguṇeṣūttamādaraḥ // Ks_6.20 //
analyzed: prāyas pratyayam ādhatte sva guṇeṣu uttama ādaraḥ

analyzed: yā naḥ prītiḥ virūpākṣa tvad anudhyāna saṃbhavā

analyzed: sā kim āvedyate tubhyam antarātmā asi dehinām

original: sākṣād dṛṣṭo 'si na punar vidmas tvāṃ vayam añjasā /
analyzed: sākṣāt dṛṣṭaḥ si na punar vidmaḥ tvām vayam añjasā

original: prasīda kathayātmānaṃ na dhiyāṃ pathi vartase // Ks_6.22 //
analyzed: prasīda kathaya ātmānam na dhiyām pathi vartase

analyzed: kim yena sṛjasi vyaktam uta yena bibharṣi tat

analyzed: kasyāścid āsīt raśanā tadānīm aṅguṣṭha mūla arpita sūtra śeṣā

analyzed: keyūra cūrṇīkṛta lāja muṣṭim himālayasya ālayam āsasāda

analyzed: gaṇāḥ ca giri ālayam abhyagacchan praśastam ārambham iva uttama arthāḥ

analyzed: pradakṣiṇa prakramaṇāt kṛśānoḥ udarciṣaḥ tat mithunam

analyzed: meroḥ upānteṣu iva vartamānam anyonya saṃsaktam ahar triyāmam

original: khaṃ prasuptam iva saṃsthite ravau tejaso mahata īdṛśī gatiḥ /
analyzed: kham prasuptam iva saṃsthite ravau tejasaḥ mahataḥ īdṛśī gatiḥ

original: tat prakāśayati yāvad udgataṃ mīlanāya khalu tāvataś cyutam // Ks_8.43 //
analyzed: tat prakāśayati yāvat udgatam mīlanāya khalu tāvataḥ cyutam

original: saṃdhyayāpy anugataṃ raver vapur vandyam astaśikhare samarpitam /
analyzed: saṃdhyayā api anugatam raveḥ vapuḥ vandyam asta śikhare samarpitam

original: yena pūrvam udaye puraskṛtā nānuyāsyati kathaṃ tam āpadi // Ks_8.44 //
analyzed: yena pūrvam udaye puraskṛtā na anuyāsyati katham tam āpadi

original: raktapītakapiśāḥ payomucāṃ koṭayaḥ kuṭilakeśi bhānty amūḥ /
analyzed: rakta pīta kapiśāḥ payomucām koṭayaḥ kuṭila keśi bhānti amūḥ

original: drakṣyasi tvam iti saṃdhyayānayā vartikābhir iva sādhumaṇḍitāḥ // Ks_8.45 //
analyzed: drakṣyasi tvam iti saṃdhyayā anayā vartikābhiḥ iva sādhu maṇḍitāḥ

original: siṃhakesarasaṭāsu bhūbhṛtāṃ pallavaprasaviṣu drumeṣu ca /
analyzed: siṃhakesara saṭāsu bhūbhṛtām pallava prasaviṣu drumeṣu ca

original: paśya dhātuśikhareṣu bhānunā saṃvibhaktam iva sāṃdhyam ātapam // Ks_8.46 //
analyzed: paśya dhātu śikhareṣu bhānunā saṃvibhaktam iva sāṃdhyam ātapam

original: adrirājatanaye tapasvinaḥ pāvanāmbuvihitāñjalikriyāḥ /
analyzed: adrirāja tanaye tapasvinaḥ pāvana ambu vihita añjali kriyāḥ

original: brahma gūḍham abhisaṃdhyam ādṛtāḥ śuddhaye vidhivido gṛṇanty amī // Ks_8.47 //
analyzed: brahma gūḍham abhisaṃdhyam ādṛtāḥ śuddhaye vidhi vidaḥ gṛṇanti amī

original: tan muhūrttam anumantum arhasi prastutāya niyamāya mām api /
analyzed: tat muhūrttam anumantum arhasi prastutāya niyamāya mām api

original: tvāṃ vinodanipuṇaḥ sakhījano valguvādini vinodayiṣyati // Ks_8.48 //
analyzed: tvām vinoda nipuṇaḥ sakhī janaḥ valgu vādini vinodayiṣyati

original: nirvibhujya daśanacchadaṃ tato vāci bhartur avadhīraṇāparā /
analyzed: nirvibhujya daśanacchadam tatas vāci bhartuḥ avadhīraṇā parā

original: śailarājatanayā samīpagām ālalāpa vijayām ahetukam // Ks_8.49 //
analyzed: śailarāja tanayā samīpa gām ālalāpa vijayām ahetukam

original: īśvaro 'pi divasātyayocitaṃ mantrapūrvam anutasthivān vidhim /
analyzed: īśvaraḥ pi divasātyaya ucitam mantra pūrvam anutasthivān vidhim

original: pārvatīm avacanām asūyayā pratyupetya punar āha sasmitam // Ks_8.50 //
analyzed: pārvatīm avacanām asūyayā pratyupetya punar āha sa smitam

original: muñca kopam animittakopane saṃdhyayā praṇamito 'smi nānyayā /
analyzed: muñca kopam animitta kopane saṃdhyayā praṇamitaḥ smi na anyayā

original: kiṃ na vetsi sahadharmacāriṇaṃ cakravākasamavṛttim ātmanaḥ // Ks_8.51 //
analyzed: kim na vetsi saha dharmacāriṇam cakravāka sama vṛttim ātmanaḥ

original: nirmiteṣu pitṛṣu svayaṃbhuvā yā tanuḥ sutanu pūrvam ujjhitā /
analyzed: nirmiteṣu pitṛṣu svayaṃbhuvā yā tanuḥ su tanu pūrvam ujjhitā

original: seyam astam udayaṃ ca sevate tena mānini mamātra gauravam // Ks_8.52 //
analyzed: sā iyam astam udayam ca sevate tena mānini mama atra gauravam

original: tām imāṃ timiravṛddhipīḍitāṃ śailarājatanaye 'dhunā sthitām /
analyzed: tām imām timira vṛddhi pīḍitām śailarāja tanaye dhunā sthitām

original: ekatas taṭatamālamālinīṃ paśya dhāturasanimnagām iva // Ks_8.53 //
analyzed: ekatas taṭa tamāla mālinīm paśya dhātu rasa nimnagām iva

original: sāndhyam astamitaśeṣam ātapaṃ raktalekham aparā bibharti dik /
analyzed: sāndhyam astamita śeṣam ātapam rakta lekham aparā bibharti diś

original: sāṃparāyavasudhā saśoṇitaṃ maṇḍalāgram iva tiryagujjhitam // Ks_8.54 //
analyzed: sāṃparāya vasudhā sa śoṇitam maṇḍala agram iva tiryak ujjhitam

original: yāminīdivasasandhisambhave tejasi vyavahite sumeruṇā /
analyzed: yāminī divasa sandhi sambhave tejasi vyavahite sumeruṇā

original: etad andhatamasaṃ niraṅkuśaṃ dikṣu dīrghanayane vijṛmbhate // Ks_8.55 //
analyzed: etat andhatamasam niraṅkuśam dikṣu dīrgha nayane vijṛmbhate

original: nordhvam īkṣaṇagatir na cāpy adho nābhito na purato na pṛṣṭhataḥ /
analyzed: na ūrdhvam īkṣaṇa gatiḥ na ca api adhas na abhitas na puratas na pṛṣṭhatas

original: loka eṣa timiraughaveṣṭito garbhavāsa iva vartate niśi // Ks_8.56 //
analyzed: lokaḥ eṣa timira ogha veṣṭitaḥ garbha vāsaḥ iva vartate niśi

original: śuddham āvilam avasthitaṃ calaṃ vakram ārjavaguṇānvitaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: śuddham āvilam avasthitam calam vakram ārjava guṇa anvitam ca yat

original: sarvam eva tamasā samīkṛtaṃ dhiṅ mahattvam asatāṃ hṛtāntaram // Ks_8.57 //
analyzed: sarvam eva tamasā samīkṛtam dhik mahat tvam asatām hṛta antaram

original: nūnam unnamati yajvanāṃ patiḥ śārvarasya tamaso niṣiddhaye /
analyzed: nūnam unnamati yajvanām patiḥ śārvarasya tamasaḥ niṣiddhaye

original: puṇḍarīkamukhi pūrvadiṅmukhaṃ kaitakair iva rajobhir āvṛtam // Ks_8.58 //
analyzed: puṇḍarīka mukhi pūrva diṅmukham kaitakaiḥ iva rajobhiḥ āvṛtam

original: mandarāntaritamūrtinā niśā lakṣyate śaśabhṛtā satārakā /
analyzed: mandara antarita mūrtinā niśā lakṣyate śaśabhṛtā sa tārakā

original: tvaṃ mayā priyasakhīsamāgatā śroṣyateva vacanāni pṛṣṭhataḥ // Ks_8.59 //
analyzed: tvam mayā priya sakhī samāgatā śroṣyatā iva vacanāni pṛṣṭhatas

original: ruddhanirgamanam ā dinakṣayāt pūrvadṛṣṭatanucandrikāsmitam /
analyzed: ruddha nirgamanam ā dina kṣayāt pūrva dṛṣṭa tanu candrikā smitam

original: etad udgirati candramaṇḍalaṃ digrahasyam iva rātricoditam // Ks_8.60 //
analyzed: etat udgirati candra maṇḍalam diś rahasyam iva rātri coditam

original: paśya pakvaphalinīphalatviṣā bimbalāñchitaviyatsaro 'mbhasā /
analyzed: paśya pakva phalinī phala tviṣā bimba lāñchita viyat saraḥ mbhasā

original: viprakṛṣṭavivaraṃ himāṃśunā cakravākamithunaṃ viḍambyate // Ks_8.61 //
analyzed: viprakṛṣṭa vivaram himāṃśunā cakravāka mithunam viḍambyate

original: śakyam oṣadhipater navodayāḥ karṇapūraracanākṛte tava /
analyzed: śakyam oṣadhipateḥ nava udayāḥ karṇapūra racanā kṛte tava

original: apragalbhayavasūcikomalāś chettum agranakhasaṃpuṭaiḥ karāḥ // Ks_8.62 //
analyzed: a pragalbha yava sūci komalāḥ chettum agra nakha saṃpuṭaiḥ karāḥ

original: aṅgulībhir iva keśasaṃcayaṃ sannigṛhya timiraṃ marīcibhiḥ /
analyzed: aṅgulībhiḥ iva keśa saṃcayam san nigṛhya timiram marīcibhiḥ

original: kuḍmalīkṛtasarojalocanaṃ cumbatīva rajanīmukhaṃ śaśī // Ks_8.63 //
analyzed: kuḍmalīkṛta saroja locanam cumbati iva rajanīmukham śaśī

original: paśya pārvati navenduraśmibhiḥ sāmibhinnatimiraṃ nabhastalam /
analyzed: paśya pārvati nava indu raśmibhiḥ sāmi bhinna timiram nabhastalam

original: lakṣyate dviradabhogadūṣitaṃ saṃprasīdad iva mānasaṃ saraḥ // Ks_8.64 //
analyzed: lakṣyate dvirada bhoga dūṣitam saṃprasīdat iva mānasam saraḥ

original: raktabhāvam apahāya candramā jāta eṣa pariśuddhamaṇḍalaḥ /
analyzed: rakta bhāvam apahāya candramāḥ jātaḥ eṣa pariśuddha maṇḍalaḥ

original: vikriyā na khalu kāladoṣajā nirmalaprakṛtiṣu sthirodayā // Ks_8.65 //
analyzed: vikriyā na khalu kāla doṣa jā nirmala prakṛtiṣu sthira udayā

original: unnateṣu śaśinaḥ prabhā sthitā nimnasaṃśrayaparaṃ niśātamaḥ /
analyzed: unnateṣu śaśinaḥ prabhā sthitā nimna saṃśraya param niśā tamaḥ

original: nūnam ātmasadṛśī prakalpitā vedhaseha guṇadoṣayor gatiḥ // Ks_8.66 //
analyzed: nūnam ātma sadṛśī prakalpitā vedhasā iha guṇa doṣayoḥ gatiḥ

original: candrapādajanitapravṛttibhiś candrakāntajalabindubhir giriḥ /
analyzed: candra pāda janita pravṛttibhiḥ candrakānta jala bindubhiḥ giriḥ

original: mekhalātaruṣu nidritān amūn bodhayaty asamaye śikhaṇḍinaḥ // Ks_8.67 //
analyzed: mekhalā taruṣu nidritān amūn bodhayati asamaye śikhaṇḍinaḥ

original: kalpavṛkṣaśikhareṣu saṃprati prasphuradbhir iva paśya sundari /
analyzed: kalpavṛkṣa śikhareṣu saṃprati prasphuradbhiḥ iva paśya sundari

original: hārayaṣṭigaṇanām ivāṃśubhiḥ kartum āgatakutūhalaḥ śaśī // Ks_8.68 //
analyzed: hāra yaṣṭi gaṇanām iva aṃśubhiḥ kartum āgata kutūhalaḥ śaśī

original: unnatāvanatabhāvavattayā candrikā satimirā girer iyam /
analyzed: unnata avanata bhāvavat tayā candrikā sa timirā gireḥ iyam

original: bhaktibhir bahuvidhābhir arpitā bhāti bhūtir iva mattadantinaḥ // Ks_8.69 //
analyzed: bhaktibhiḥ bahuvidhābhiḥ arpitā bhāti bhūtiḥ iva matta dantinaḥ

original: etad ucchvasitapītam aindavaṃ voḍhum akṣamam iva prabhārasam /
analyzed: etat ucchvasita pītam aindavam voḍhum akṣamam iva prabhā rasam

original: muktaṣaṭpadavirāvam añjasā bhidyate kumudam ā nibandhanāt // Ks_8.70 //
analyzed: mukta ṣaṭpada virāvam añjasā bhidyate kumudam nibandhanāt

original: paśya kalpatarulambi śuddhayā jyotsnayā janitarūpasaṃśayam /
analyzed: paśya kalpataru lambi śuddhayā jyotsnayā janita rūpa saṃśayam

original: mārute calati caṇḍi kevalaṃ vyajyate viparivṛttam aṃśukam // Ks_8.71 //
analyzed: mārute calati caṇḍi kevalam vyajyate viparivṛttam aṃśukam

original: śakyam aṅgulibhir uddhṛtair adhaḥ śākhināṃ patitapuṣpapeśalaiḥ /
analyzed: śakyam aṅgulibhiḥ uddhṛtaiḥ adhas śākhinām patita puṣpa peśalaiḥ

original: patrajarjaraśaśiprabhālavair ebhir utkacayituṃ tavālakān // Ks_8.72 //
analyzed: patra jarjara śaśi prabhā lavaiḥ ebhiḥ utkacayitum tava alakān

original: eṣa cārumukhi yogatārayā yujyate taralabimbayā śaśī /
analyzed: eṣa cāru mukhi yogatārayā yujyate tarala bimbayā śaśī

original: sādhvasād upagataprakampayā kanyayeva navadīkṣayā varaḥ // Ks_8.73 //
analyzed: sādhvasāt upagata prakampayā kanyayā iva nava dīkṣayā varaḥ

original: pākabhinnaśarakāṇḍagaurayor ullasatpratikṛtiprasannayoḥ /
analyzed: pāka bhinna śara kāṇḍa gaurayoḥ ullasat pratikṛti prasannayoḥ

original: rohatīva tava gaṇḍalekhayoś candrabimbanihitākṣṇi candrikā // Ks_8.74 //
analyzed: rohati iva tava gaṇḍa lekhayoḥ candra bimba nihita akṣṇi candrikā

original: lohitārkamaṇibhājanārpitaṃ kalpavṛkṣamadhu bibhratī svayam /
analyzed: lohita arka maṇi bhājana arpitam kalpavṛkṣa madhu bibhratī svayam

original: tvām iyaṃ sthitimatīm upasthitā gandhamādanavanādhidevatā // Ks_8.75 //
analyzed: tvām iyam sthitimatīm upasthitā gandhamādana vana adhidevatā

original: ārdrakesarasugandhi te mukhaṃ mattaraktanayanaṃ svabhāvataḥ /
analyzed: ārdra kesara sugandhi te mukham matta rakta nayanam svabhāvataḥ

original: atra labdhavasatir guṇāntaraṃ kiṃ vilāsini madaḥ kariṣyati // Ks_8.76 //
analyzed: atra labdha vasatiḥ guṇa antaram kim vilāsini madaḥ kariṣyati

original: mānyabhaktir athavā sakhījanaḥ sevyatām idam anaṅgadīpanam /
analyzed: mānya bhaktiḥ athavā sakhī janaḥ sevyatām idam anaṅga dīpanam

original: ity udāram abhidhāya śaṅkaras tām apāyayata pānam ambikām // Ks_8.77 //
analyzed: iti udāram abhidhāya śaṅkaraḥ tām apāyayata pānam ambikām

original: pārvatī tadupayogasambhavāṃ vikriyām api satāṃ manoharām /
analyzed: pārvatī tad upayoga sambhavām vikriyām api satām manoharām

original: apratarkyavidhiyoganirmitām āmrateva sahakāratāṃ yayau // Ks_8.78 //
analyzed: apratarkya vidhi yoga nirmitām āmra tā iva sahakāra tām yayau

original: tatkṣaṇaṃ viparivartitahriyor neṣyatoḥ śayanam iddharāgayoḥ /
analyzed: tad kṣaṇam viparivartita hriyoḥ neṣyatoḥ śayanam iddha rāgayoḥ

original: sā babhūva vaśavartinī dvayoḥ śūlinaḥ suvadanā madasya ca // Ks_8.79 //
analyzed: sā babhūva vaśa vartinī dvayoḥ śūlinaḥ su vadanā madasya ca

original: ghūrṇamānanayanaṃ skhalatkathaṃ svedibindumad akāraṇasmitam /
analyzed: ghūrṇamāna nayanam skhalat katham svedi bindumat akāraṇa smitam

original: ānanena na tu tāvad īśvaraś cakṣuṣā ciram umāmukhaṃ papau // Ks_8.80 //
analyzed: ānanena na tu tāvat īśvaraḥ cakṣuṣā ciram umā mukham papau

original: tāṃ vilambitapanīyamekhalām udvahañ jaghanabhāradurvahām /
analyzed: tām vilambi tapanīya mekhalām udvaham jaghana bhāra durvahām

original: dhyānasaṃbhṛtavibhūtir īśvaraḥ prāviśan maṇiśilāgṛhaṃ rahaḥ // Ks_8.81 //
analyzed: dhyāna saṃbhṛta vibhūtiḥ īśvaraḥ prāviśat maṇi śilā gṛham rahaḥ

original: tatra haṃsadhavalottaracchadaṃ jāhnavīpulinacārudarśanam /
analyzed: tatra haṃsa dhavala uttaracchadam jāhnavī pulina cāru darśanam

original: adhyaśeta śayanaṃ priyāsakhaḥ śāradābhram iva rohiṇīpatiḥ // Ks_8.82 //
analyzed: adhyaśeta śayanam priyā sakhaḥ śārada abhram iva rohiṇīpatiḥ

original: kliṣṭakeśam avaluptacandanaṃ vyatyayārpitanakhaṃ samatsaram /
analyzed: kliṣṭa keśam avalupta candanam vyatyaya arpita nakham sa matsaram

original: tasya tac chiduramekhalāguṇaṃ pārvatīratam abhūn na tṛptaye // Ks_8.83 //
analyzed: tasya tat chidura mekhalā guṇam pārvatī ratam abhūt na tṛptaye

original: kevalaṃ priyatamādayālunā jyotiṣām avanatāsu paṅktiṣu /
analyzed: kevalam priyatama adayālunā jyotiṣām avanatāsu paṅktiṣu

original: tena tatparigṛhītavakṣasā netramīlanakutūhalaṃ kṛtam // Ks_8.84 //
analyzed: tena tad parigṛhīta vakṣasā netra mīlana kutūhalam kṛtam

original: sa vyabudhyata budhastavocitaḥ śatakumbhakamalākaraiḥ samam /
analyzed: sa vyabudhyata budhaḥ tava ucitaḥ śatakumbha kamala ākaraiḥ samam

original: mūrcchanāparigṛhītakaiśikaiḥ kinnarair uṣasi gītamaṅgalaḥ // Ks_8.85 //
analyzed: mūrcchanā parigṛhīta kaiśikaiḥ kinnaraiḥ uṣasi gīta maṅgalaḥ

original: tau kṣaṇaṃ śithilitopagūhanau dampatī calitamānasor mayaḥ /
analyzed: tau kṣaṇam śithilita upagūhanau dampatī calita mānasoḥ mayaḥ

original: padmabhedapiśunāḥ siṣevire gandhamādanavanāntamārutāḥ // Ks_8.86 //
analyzed: padma bheda piśunāḥ siṣevire gandhamādana vanānta mārutāḥ

original: ūrumūlanakhamārgarājibhis tatkṣaṇaṃ hṛtavilocano haraḥ /
analyzed: ūru mūla nakha mārga rājibhiḥ tad kṣaṇam hṛta vilocanaḥ haraḥ

original: vāsasaḥ praśithilasya saṃyamaṃ kurvatīṃ priyatamām avārayat // Ks_8.87 //
analyzed: vāsasaḥ praśithilasya saṃyamam kurvatīm priyatamām avārayat

original: sa prajāgarakaṣāyalocanaṃ gāḍhadantapadatāḍitādharam /
analyzed: sa prajāgara kaṣāya locanam gāḍha danta pada tāḍita adharam

original: ākulālakam araṃsta rāgavān prekṣya bhinnatilakaṃ priyāmukham // Ks_8.88 //
analyzed: ākula alakam araṃsta rāgavān prekṣya bhinna tilakam priyā mukham

original: tena bhaṅgiviṣamottaracchadaṃ madhyapiṇḍitavisūtramekhalam /
analyzed: tena bhaṅgi viṣama uttaracchadam madhya piṇḍita visūtra mekhalam

original: nirmale 'pi śayanaṃ niśātyaye nojjhitaṃ caraṇarāgalāñchitam // Ks_8.89 //
analyzed: nirmale śayanam niśā atyaye nā ujjhitam caraṇa rāga lāñchitam

original: sa priyāmukharasaṃ divāniśaṃ harṣavṛddhijananaṃ siṣeviṣuḥ /
analyzed: sa priyā mukha rasam divāniśam harṣa vṛddhi jananam siṣeviṣuḥ

original: darśanapraṇayinām adṛśyatām ājagāma vijayānivedanāt // Ks_8.90 //
analyzed: darśana praṇayinām adṛśya tām ājagāma vijayā nivedanāt

original: samadivasaniśīthaṃ saṅginas tatra śambhoḥ śatam agamad ṛtūnāṃ sāgram ekā niśeva /
analyzed: sama divasa niśītham saṅginaḥ tatra śambhoḥ śatam agamat ṛtūnām sāgram ekā niśā iva

original: na tu suratasukheṣu chinnatṛṣṇo babhūva jvalana iva samudrāntargatas tajjaleṣu // Ks_8.91 //
analyzed: na tu surata sukheṣu chinna tṛṣṇaḥ babhūva jvalanaḥ iva samudra antargataḥ tad jaleṣu
